400a4(myang 'das): bu mdo sde 'di ni 'jigs pa med pa'i rgyal po chen po ste/nyon mongs pa'i bdud ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ba ni/ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal pos ri dgas thams
400a5(myang 'das): cad thul ba dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'dri ni reg pa'i sngags chen mo ste/nyon mongs pa'i gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba ni 'jig rten na sngags mkhan
400a6(myang 'das): gyis gdon med par byed pa dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni bla na med pa'i ba mo 'am//ser ba lta bu ste/'khor ba'i 'bras bu thams cad bcom pa ni/ji ltar 'jig
400a7(myang 'das): rten na ba mo 'am/sor bas 'bras bu thams cad bcom pa dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni tshul khrims kyi mig nyams pa'i sman bzang po lta bur 'gyur te/'jig rten
400b1(myang 'das): na sman an+ta na zhes bya ba mig na ba thams cad la phan par byed pa dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur te/ji ltar 'jig rten gyi sa ltar
400b2(myang 'das): dngos po thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni tshul khrims nyams pa'i sems can gyi me long gsal bar 'gyur te/ji ltar 'jig rten gyi
400b3(myang 'das): me long gsal bas gzugs thams cad snang ba dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni khrel ba dang 'dzem pa med pa'i gos su 'gyur te/ji ltar 'jig rten ni gos kyis lus
400b4(myang 'das): sgrib cing g.yog pa dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni dge ba'i chos kyis dbul ba rnams kyi nor rin po cher 'gyur te/ji ltar lha bkra shis mas dbul ba thams cad la
400b5(myang 'das): phan par 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni chos kyis skom pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bdud rtsi'i tshur 'gyur te/ji ltar yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus
400b6(myang 'das): skom pa thams cad ngoms par byed pa dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi khrir 'gyur te/ji ltar 'jig rten na gang zag dag bde
400b7(myang 'das): ba'i khri la phrad pa dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' nas sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bar gyi rgyan dang /bdug pa dang /me tog dang /
401a1(myang 'das): byug pa dang /byug spros dang /spos phye ma dang /bdug spos rnam par dag pa'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'i theg pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas par
401a2(myang 'das): byed do//rab tu bde ba myong bar byed pa ni/ji ltar sum cu rtswa gsum gnam gyi shing pa ri tsi tra dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni ye shes kyi mtshon ngar can+da lta bu ste/
401a3(myang 'das): nyon mongs pa'i shing thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro//'di ni mtshan rnon po lta bu ste/bag chags thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro//'di ni shin tu dpa' zhing rtul
401a4(myang 'das): bod pa lta bu ste/phas rgol ba'i bdud thams cad bcom pa'o//'di ni ye shes kyi me lta bu ste/nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'o//'di ni rten cing 'brel te
401a5(myang 'das): 'byung ba'i snying po lta bu ste/rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so//'di ni thos pa'i gter lta bu ste/nyan thos kyi skye gnas yin no//'di ni lha thams cad
401a6(myang 'das): kyi mog lta bu'o//'di ni mi thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i lam yin no//'di ni byol song gi skye gnas thams cad kyi brten pa'i gnas yin no//'di ni yi dgas thams
401a7(myang 'das): cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i gnas yin no//'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i bla ni med pa'i mchog yin no//'di ni phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i
401b1(myang 'das): snong yin no//'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /dra ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad k+Shi yab dang yum yin no//rigs kyi bu de bas na/
401b2(myang 'das): mimado sde 'dis ni chos thams cad bsdus so//ngas ster gsungs pa ltor mdo sde 'dis chos thams cad bsdus par gsungs mod kyi/ngas ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi tshes sum cu
401b3(myang 'das): rtsa bden la tshangs par spyod pa yin zhes gsungs so///'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo//bam po lto bcug//rigs kyi
401b4(myang 'das): bu byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun ma gtogs par/gzhan gyis nyan+da thos kyi 'bras bu yang dag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu'i bar du thob
401b5(myang 'das): par mi 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang /sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu'ang mi mthong ngo //de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis tshangs par spyod pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu
401b6(myang 'das): rtsa bdun no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun phyin ci log gi rang bzhin ma yin pas phyin ci log rnam par 'jig par byed do//ngan par lta ba'i rang bzhin /
401b7(myang 'das): ma yin pas ngan por lta ba 'jig par byed do//'jig pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pas 'jig pa yongs su 'jig par byed do//rang bzhon gyis yongs su dag par spyod pa//
402a1(myang 'das): yin pas sems can+da dag mthar yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom
402a2(myang 'das): ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni zug pa med pa'i chos kyi rgyur yang 'gyur no/de bzhin gshegs pas ci'i slad du zag pa dang bcas pa la/yongs su dag pa'i
402a3(myang 'das): tshangs par spyod pa'o zhes ma gsungs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu zag pa dang bcus pa thams cad ni phyin ci log pa yin te/de bas na zag pa
402a4(myang 'das): dang bcas po la yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten mchog gi chos
402a5(myang 'das): zhes bgyi ba/zag pa dang bcas pa lags sa mo/zag pa ma mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu zag pa dang bcas pa yin no///
402a6(myang 'das): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa lags mod kyi/rang bzhin gyis phyin ci log ma lags na/ci'i slad du yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes
402a7(myang 'das): mi bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten mchog gi chos ni zag pa med pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas zag pa med pa dang 'dra'o//zag pa med pa la phyogs
402b1(myang 'das): pas phyin ci log ces mi bya'o//rigs kyi bu yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'i sems skyed pa rgyun ma chad pa nas/mthar 'jig rten mchog gi chos kyi bar du sems rtse gcig/
402b2(myang 'das): tu zad de/de bas na yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i 'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi rnam parwa shes
402b3(myang 'das): pa lnga ni zag pa dang bcas pa'ang lags te/phyin ci log pa ma lcogs la sems rtse gcig pa'ang ma lags na ci'i slad du yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes mi bgyi//
402b4(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu sems can gyi rnam par shes pa lnga ni sems rtse gcig pa ma yin yang gang zag pa dang bcas pa yin la/phyin ci log
402b5(myang 'das): kyang yin te/zag pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o//ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag pa mya yin te/'du shes la chags pas phyin ci log po zhes bya'o///
402b6(myang 'das): de la ji ltar na ngo bo nyid kyis yang dog pa ma yin te/'du shes la chagaso pas phyin ci log ces bya zhe na/pho dang mo ma yin pa lnga pho dang mor 'du shes bskyed pa nas/khang
402b7(myang 'das): pa dang /theg pa dang /bum pa dang /gos kyi bar du de bzhin du rgyas par rig por bya ste/de dag ni phyin ci log ces bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa
403a1(myang 'das): bdun ni rang bzhin gyis phyin ni log pa ma yin te/de bas na yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang byang
403a2(myang 'das): chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun las rtsa ba'ong shes/rgyu'ang shes/bsdu ba'ang shes/bskyed pa'ang shes/bdag po'ang shes/dad dpon yang shes/rgyal ba 'ong
403a3(myang 'das): shos/yang dag pa'ang shes/mthar phyin pa'adra shes na/byang chub sems dpa' de ni yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'
403a4(myang 'das): 'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar na rtsa bar shes pa nas mthar phyin pa'i bar du shes pa zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs
403a5(myang 'das): kyi bu logs so legs so//byang chub sems dpas zhu ba la dngos po rnam pa gnyis te/gang zhe na/bdag shes par bya ba dang /gzhan shes par byed pa'o//
403a6(myang 'das): khyod kyis rtogs shing shes kyang sems can tshad med pa snyed ma gtogs mi shes pa dag gi phyir dngos po 'di dag zhu ba logs so legs so zhes bstod do//rigs
403a7(myang 'das): kyi bu byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rtsa ba ni mos pa yin te/rgyu ni gsal bar reg pa zhes bya/bsdu ba ni tshor ba zhes bya/bskyed pa ni legs par yid la
403b1(myang 'das): byed pa zhes bya/bdag po ni dran pa zhes bya/ded dpon ni ting nge 'dzin ces bya/rgyal ba ni shes rab ces bya/yang dag pa ni rnam par grol ba zhes bya/mthar phyin pa ni yongs
403b2(myang 'das): su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes bya/rigs kyi bu shin tu mos pa ni thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi rtsa ba yin
403b3(myang 'das): te/de bas na mos pa ni rtsa ba zhes gsungs so//rigs kyi bu dper na 'jig rten na sdug bsngal thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni sred pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /nad thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni kha
403b4(myang 'das): zas ma zhu ba yin no zhes bya ba dang /zhal che thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni rtsod pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /mi dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni brdzun yin no zhes bya ba dang 'dra'o//byang chub
403b5(myang 'das): sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sngar mdo sde 'di'i ning nas dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni bag byas pa lags so zhes gsungs
403b6(myang 'das): la/da ni mos pa lags so zhes gsungs pa'i don ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gal te skye ba'i rgyu la byo na ni shin tu mos pa yin no///
403b7(myang 'das): gal te gsal ba'i rgyu la bya na ni bag byed pa yin no//dper na 'jig rten pa dge 'bras bu thams cad kyi rgyu ni sa bon yin no zhes bya ba dong /gzhon yang sa bon ni skye ba'i rgyu
404a1(myang 'das): yin no zhes bya ba dang /sa ni gsal ba'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don yang de dang 'dra'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan
404a2(myang 'das): 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde gzhan las byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rtsa ba ni sangs rgyas lags so zhes bgyi ba'i don ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan
404a3(myang 'das): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gang byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun thog ma shes pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi rtsa ba yin no zhes gsungs so//
404a4(myang 'das): gang rang gis rig pa la ni shin tu mos pa rtsa ba yin no zhes gsungs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar na gsal bar rig pa la rgyu zhes bgyi ba lags/bcom
404a5(myang 'das): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas bar bar ni gsal ba la shes rab ces kyang gsungs/bar bar ni dad pa zhes kyang gsungs so//
404a6(myang 'das): rigs kyi bu dad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen par 'gyur te/de bas na reg pa zhes bya'o//dge ba'i bshes la brten pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis dam
404a7(myang 'das): pa'i chos thob par 'gyur to/de'ang reg pa zhes bya'o//dam pa'i chos thos pa'i rkyen gyis lus dang /drag dang yid kyi las yongs su dag par 'gyur te/de'ang reg
404b1(myang 'das): ba zhes bya'o//lus dang /ngagu dang /yid kyi las yongs su dag pa'i rkyen gyis yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba thob par 'gyur te/de'ang reg pa zhes bya'o//yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen gyis
404b2(myang 'das): yongs su drug pa'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro//yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi rkyen gyis bas mtha'i dgon pa la dga' bar 'gyur ro//byas mtha'i dgon pa la dga'
404b3(myang 'das): ba'i rkyen gyis shin tu yid la byed par 'gyur ro//shin tu yid la byas pas chos bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro//chos bzhin du gnas pa'i rkyen gyis byang chub kyi phyogs sum
404b4(myang 'das): cu rtsa bdun thob ste/kun nas nyon mongs pa tshad med pa snyed choms par 'gyur te/de ni reg pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu tshor ba la sdud pa zhes bya'o//sems can gyis tshor ba
404b5(myang 'das): myong ba ni dge ba drung sdig pa byed par 'gyur te/de bas na tshor ba la sdud pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu tshor ba'i rkyen gyis kun nas nyon mongs po mang po skye'o//byang chub kyi phyogs
404b6(myang 'das): sum cu rtsa bdun gyis kun nos nyon mongs pa choms par 'gyur te/de bas na tshor bya spyad pa zhes bya'o//shin tu legs par yid la byed pa'i rkyen gyis kun nas nyon mongs
404b7(myang 'das): pa choms par 'gyur te/de bas na bskyed pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/brtson 'grus su nan tan byas na byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun thob par 'gyur ro//gang
405a1(myang 'das): gis de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa gzhos par bsams na dran pa la rag lus te/de bas na dran pa ni bdag po zhes bya'o//dper na 'jig rten na tshogs rnam/
405a2(myang 'das): pa bzhi ni dmag dpon gyi yid bzhin du 'gro ba ltar byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun yang de dang 'dra ste/bdag po dran pa'i rjes su 'gron//rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin du
405a3(myang 'das): zhugs pas byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad rtogs par 'gyur te/de bas na ting nge 'dzin na ded dpon zhes bya'o//byang chub kyi phyogs
405a4(myang 'das): sumacu rtsa bdun gyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa'ang shes rab mchog tu 'gyur te/de bas na shes rab ni rgyal ba zhes bya'o//de ltar shes rab kyis nyon mongs pa rtogs nas
405a5(myang 'das): shes rab kyi stobs kyis nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur te/ji ltar 'jig rten na tshogs rnam bzhis dgra pham pa'ang dpa' bo gcig gam gnyis tsam lnga rag lus pa
405a6(myang 'das): ltar byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun yang de dang 'dra ste/shes rab kyi mthus nyon mongs pa choms pas shes rab kyi rgyal ba zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi
405a7(myang 'das): phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun la nan tan byas pas bsam gtan bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa dang /bde ba thob mod kyi yang dag pa zhes mi bya ste/gang nyon mongs pa
405b1(myang 'das): bcom nas rnam par grol ba thob pa'i tshe na yang dag pa zhes bya'o//byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun la sems bskyed de nan tan byas pas 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang /'jig rten
405b2(myang 'das): las 'das pa'i bde ba dang /dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang /rnam par grol ba thob mod kyi mthar phyin pa zhes mi bya'o//gang zhig gis byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun sbyong
405b3(myang 'das): ba'i dngos po yongs su bcad na de ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/de byas na mthar phyin pa la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes ngas gsungs so//rigs kyi bu
405b4(myang 'das): gzhan yang shin tu 'dod pa'i sems ni mos pa zhes bya'o//shin tu 'dod pas dge bo'i bshes gnyen lo bsnyen par 'gyur te/de ni reg pa zhes kyang bya/rgyu zhes kyang bya'o///
405b5(myang 'das): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pas tshor ba zhes kyang bya ste/de ni sdud pa zhes bya'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pas shin tu yid la byed par 'gyur te bskyed pa zhes
405b6(myang 'das): bya'o//chos rnam pa 'di bzhi'i rkyen gyis byang chub skye bo ni mos pa dang /dran pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab yin te/de ni bdag po dang /ded dpon dang /rgyal
405b7(myang 'das): bo zhes bya'o//chos rnam pa 'di gsumo gyi rkyeni gyos rnam par grol ba gnyis thob par 'gyur ro//'dod pa yongs su bcad pas ni sems rnam par grol la/ma rig pa
406a1(myang 'das): yongs su bcad pas shes rab rnam par grol te/de ni yang dag pa zhes bya'o//de ltar chos rnam pa 'di brgyad kyis mthar 'bras bu thob par 'gyur bas
406a2(myang 'das): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/mthar phyin pa zhes kyang bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang mos pa ni sems bskyed nas rab tu byung ba'o//reg pa ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i
406a3(myang 'das): los byas pa ste/de ni rgyu zhes bya'o//bzung ba ni tshul khrims rnam pa gnyis nod pa ste/so sor thur pa dang /rtsa ba yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims te/de ni tsher ba
406a4(myang 'das): dang yongs su bzung ba zhes bya'o//bskyed pa ni bsam gtan bzhi la nan tan byed pa'o//bdag po ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras
406a5(myang 'das): bu'o//ded dpon ni lan cig phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu'o//rgyal ba ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'o//yang dag pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'o//mthar phyin pa
406a6(myang 'das): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang mos pa ni rnam par shes pa'o//reg pa ni skye mched drug go/sdud pa ni tshor ba'o///
406a7(myang 'das): skye ba ni ma rig pa'o//bdag po ni ming dang gzugs so//ded dpon ni 'dod pa'o//rgyal ba ni len pa'o//yang dag pa ni srid pa'o//mthar phyin pa ni skye ba dang rga ba
406b1(myang 'das): dang /nab dang 'chi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gyes gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rgyu ba dang /rgyu dang /bskyod pa dang /gsum la ba dang dra'ang ci mchis/
406b2(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra'o skal pa/rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni thog ma sems bskyed pa la bye'o//rgyu zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'o//bskyed pa nI 'dra ba 'gags
406b3(myang 'das): nas 'dra ba skyed pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rtso ba zhes bya ba ni byed pa'o//rgyu zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o//bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni dgos pa'o//rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs
406b4(myang 'das): bya'i dus na nom par smin pa'i 'bras bu yod kyang ma myong ba'i phyir d+hA zhes bya'o//nam myong bar 'gyur ba'i rgyun bskyed pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rna ba zhes byu
406b5(myang 'das): ni tshor ba'o//thob pa ni rgyu'o//dgos pa ni bskyed po'o//rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di lo su rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i la mo mo//d+hu zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam mo//
406b6(myang 'das): bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni mi slob pa'i lam mo//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i rgyu'o//rgyu zhes bya ba ni thabs yin te/thabs mkhas pas
406b7(myang 'das): 'bros bu thob par gyur to//'bras bu thob pas bskyed pa zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar
407a1(myang 'das): mthar phyin pa la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi na mya ngan las 'das pa de thob par rung ngam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi
407a2(myang 'das): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am/dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang zhig 'du shes bcu la nan tan
407a3(myang 'das): byas na des mya ngan las 'das pa thob par rig par bya'o//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste mi rtag par 'du shes pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'du shes pa dang /bdag
407a4(myang 'das): med par 'du shes pa dang /kha zas spong bar 'du shes pa dang /'jig rten thams cad la mi chags par 'du shes pa dang /shi bar 'du shes pa dang /nyes
407a5(myang 'das): pa'i skyon mang bar 'du shes pa dang /spong bar 'du shes pa dang /'gog par 'du shes pa dang /sred pa med par 'du shes pa'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub
407a6(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang gis 'du shes rnam pa bcu po 'di la nan
407a7(myang 'das): tan byas na mthar nges par mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro//de bas na gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa rtogs par 'gyur
407b1(myang 'das): tre/de ni yang dag pa'i dge slong yin pa nas dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma yang dag pa'i bar du yin no//byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
407b2(myang 'das): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nas dge bsnyen ma'i bar du mi rtag par 'du shes pa la nan tan bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub
407b3(myang 'das): sems dpa' la rnam pa gnyis te/thog ma sems bskyed pa dang /byang chub la nan tan byed pa'o//mi rtag par 'du shes pa la'ang rnam pa gnyis te/sbom po dang /phra
407b4(myang 'das): mo'o//thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpes mi rtag pa la 'du shes pa'i tshe na 'di snyam du sems so//'jig rten gyi dngos po la'ang rnam pa gnyis te/nang dang
407b5(myang 'das): phyi rol lo//da ltar nang gi dngos po ni me rtag la 'gyur zhing 'pho ba ste/bdag gi lus 'di thog ma bcas pa dang /gzhon nu dang /lang tsho ba dang /rgas 'khogs pa dang /
407b6(myang 'das): shi ba la sogs pa'i dus dang /tshad so sor tha dad de/de byas na nang gi dngos po ni mi rtag par rtogs so//mi rtag pari rig go/gzhan yang 'di snyam du bdag gis sems
407b7(myang 'das): can dag la brtags na/kha cig kha dog dang mdog dang mthu stobs su ldan te/'gro ba dang 'ong ba la thogs pa med par dbang du gyur/kha cig ni nad kyis gzir nas shin
408a1(myang 'das): tu rid de mdog dang kha dog du mi ldan/mthu stobs med pas dbang du ma gyur to//kha cig ni shin tu longs spyod dang ldan te bang mdzod kyang yongs su gang ngo //
408a2(myang 'das): kha cig ni dbul phongs pasna ci'ang mi bdog go//kha cig ni yon tan phun sum tshugs pa dang ldan par mthong ngo //kha cig ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan par mthong
408a3(myang 'das): bsla de bsun nges par nang gi chos n+ni myi rtag par rig go//gzhan yang phyi rol gyi chos rnams ni sa bon dang /myu gu dang /sdong bu dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras
408a4(myang 'das): bu'i choso sor tha dad de/dwe ltar phyi rol gyi chos kyang kha cig ni phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan//kha cig ni phun sum tshogs pa dang mi ldan te/de bas na phyi rol gyi chos
408a5(myang 'das): thams cad kyang mi rtag par rig go snyam sems so//de ltar chos thams cad mi rtag par rtogs nas thos pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad la 'di ltar rtog go/bdag
408a6(myang 'das): gis thos na ma ris kyi lha rnams kyang shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/mngon par shes pa dang dbang du ldan yang lces lha mngon par byung
408a7(myang 'das): bas de bas na mi rtag par rig go//gzhan yang bskal pa thog ma'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang so so nas yon tan mchog dam pa dang ldan te/so so'i lus kyi
408b1(myang 'das): 'od kyis snang bar byed kyi nyi ma zla ba'i 'od la rag ma lus so zhes thos te/mi rtag pa'i mthus 'od kyang nyams nas yon tan yang med par gyur to//gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur
408b2(myang 'das): ba'i rgyal po lta bu gling bzhi la dbang ste/rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i dbang chen po thob kyang mi rtag pa bcom ma nus so zhes thos so//gzhan yang sa chen po 'di la sngon ni
408b3(myang 'das): sems can tshad med pa snyed bde bar gnas te/shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyis stong yang med par sman dam pa sna tshogs dang /nags tshal dang /bza' shing dang /'bras
408b4(myang 'das): bu la sogs pa shin tu rgyas pa las da ni sems can bsod nams chungs pas sa chen po 'di'i mthu stobs med par gyur te/sa las skyes pa'i rnams kyang ro med cing ya ma
408b5(myang 'das): brla ru gyur te/de bas na phyi nang gi chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin te/de ni mi rtag pa sbom po zhes bya'o//de ltar sbom po rtogs nas mthar gyis phra mo la rtog go//de
408b6(myang 'das): la phra mo zhes bya ba gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyi nang gi chos thams cad nas rdul phra rab kyi bar du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi rtag par rtog go/
408b7(myang 'das): de ci'i phyir zhe na/mtshan ma yongs su bcom pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//gal to ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs de mi rtag pa ma yin na/gzugs la khyad par gyi dus rnam pa 'di
409a1(myang 'das): bcu yod do zhes smra ba mi rung ngo //bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nur nur po'i dus dang /mer mer gyi dus dang /mkhregs pa'i dus dang /sha grong gong por
409a2(myang 'das): gyur pa'i dus dang /yan lag skyes pa'i dus dang /bus pa chung ngu'i dus dang /gzhon nu'i dus dang /lang tshwa'i dus dang /dra ra la bab pa'i dus dang /rgas pa'i dus so//
409a3(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' nur nur po'i tshe na mi rtag pa ma yin par rtog na mar mer nas lang tsho ba'i bar du'ang mi 'gyur la/mi rtag pa ma yin par rtogs na rgas par yang mi
409a4(myang 'das): 'gyur ro//de ltar dus mang po skad cig skad cig gis 'gog pa ma yin na bags kyis skye bar mi rigs te/dus gcig tu tshang du phyin par skye bar rigs so//de ltar
409a5(myang 'das): dus gcig du tshad du phyin par skye ba'i gnas med de/de bas na nges par skad cig skad cig gis 'gog pa'i mi rtag pa phra mo yod par rig go/gzhan yang gang zag
409a6(myang 'das): kha cig ni sngon dbang po dang mdog tu ldan te/phyis rkus cing nyams pa'ang mthong ba snga na gang zag de ni skad cig skad cig gis nges par mi rtag par mngon no//gzhan
409a7(myang 'das): yang chen po bzhi dang /spyod lam bzhi la rtog go/gzhan yang phyi nang rnam pa gnyis la sdug bsngal gyi rgyu rnam pa gnyis gnyis yod de/bkres pa dang /skom pa dang //
409b1(myang 'das): grang ba dang /tsha ba yang rtog go/gzhan yang de ltar rnam pa bzhi po de skad cig skad cig gis mi rtag pa phra mo ma yin na sdug bsngal rnam pa bzhi po'ang gsung bar mi rigs su
409b2(myang 'das): snyam du sems so//byang chub sems dpa' gang gis de ltar rtog na de ni byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa phra mo la rtog pa zhes bya'o//phyi nang gi gzugs la ji lta bzhin
409b3(myang 'das): du sems kyi chos kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o//de na'i phyir zhe na/skye mchod drug la spyod pa'i phyir ro//skye mched drug la spyod pa na bar bar ni dga' ba'i sems skye
409b4(myang 'das): byar bar ni zhe sdang gi sems skye/bar ba rin 'dod pa'i sems skye/bar bar ni dran pa'i sems skyo ste/da ltar tha dad pa'i sems skye ste/gcig tu ma chad pas gzugs
409b5(myang 'das): kyi chos dang gzugs ma yin pa'i chos thams cad mi rtag par rig go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig skad cig skad cig la chos thams cad skye ba dang /
409b6(myang 'das): 'gog pa dang /mi rtag par mthong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab n+dan ni de ltar mi rtog pa'i
409b7(myang 'das): 'du shes la nan tan byas nas rtag pa'i nga rgyal dang /rtag pa'i phyin ci log dang /byin ci lag gi 'dro shes yongs su spong ste/sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes la nan tan byed/
410a1(myang 'das): do//ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'di ltar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur snyam bsams na sdug bsngal de ni mi rtag pa'i rgyu las byung bar shes so//mi rtag pa'i rkyen
410a2(myang 'das): gyis skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /shi ba myong bar gyur te/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /shi ba'i rkyen gyis mi rtag pa zhes bya'o//mi rtag pa'i rkyen gyis phyi
410a3(myang 'das): nang gi sdug bsngal mang po myong ba ni bkres pa dang /skom pa dang /grang ba dang /tsha ba dang /rdeg pa dang /'tshog pa dang /spyo ba dang /ga shi ba'i sdug bsngal myong ngo ///
410a4(myang 'das): de ltar sdug bsngal mang po myong ba'ang mi rtag pa'i rkyen gyis myong bar gyur to//gzhan yang mkhas pa shes rab can ni lus 'di la mi rtag pa'i sdod yin par rtog go/
410a5(myang 'das): snod sdug bsngal ba yin te/de ltar snod sdug bsngal ba yin pas bcud kyang de dang 'dra bar sdug bsngal gyi chos yin par rtog go/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu mkhas pa
410a6(myang 'das): shes rab can ni skye ba nyid kyang sdug bsngal bar rtog la/'gog pa'ang sdug bsngal bar rtog ste/sdug bsngal gyis skye zhing 'gog pas na mi rtag pa yin te/bdag
410a7(myang 'das): dang bdag gi ba ma yin par mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la nan tan byed do//gzhan yang mkhas pa shes rab can ni sdug bsngal nyid mi rtag pa yin la/mi rtag pa nyid
410b1(myang 'das): kyang sdug bsngal ba yin te/de ltar sdug bsngal ba nyid mi rtag pa yin pas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ci'i phyir 'drug yod ces smra/de ltar bdag ma yin pas na mi rtag
410b2(myang 'das): pa'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o//de bzhin du phreng po lnga'ang sdug bsngal ba'ang yin la mi rtag pa'ang yin na sems can gyis ci'i phyir bdag yod ces smra/gzhan yang chos
410b3(myang 'das): thams cad ni tha dad 'dus pa las skyes kyi gcig pu zhig 'dus pa las chos thams cad skyes pa'ang ma yin la/chos gcig kyang thams cad 'dus pa'i 'bras bu ma yin par
410b4(myang 'das): togs te/'dus pa thams cad bdag gi rang bzhin yang med/gcig pa'i rang bzhin yang med tha dad pa'i rang bzhin yang med/dngos po'i rang bzhin yang med/dbang du gyur
410b5(myang 'das): pa'i rang bzhin yang med do//chos thams cad la gal te rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid de dag yod na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ci'i phyir bdag yod par smra/gzhan yang
410b6(myang 'das): 'di snyam du chos thams cad gcig tsam yang byed pa po med do//de ltar chos gcig tsam yang byed pa po med de/chos thams cad 'dus pa las byed pa po med do//chos
410b7(myang 'das): thams cad rang bzhin gyis rang skye ba 'am/ring 'gog par mi 'gyur te/'dus pa las 'gog cing 'dus pa las skye ste/de ltar chos skyes nas sems can gyis phyin
411a1(myang 'das): ci log pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/'dus pa las skye'o zhes smra'o//sems can gyis phyin ci log tu 'du shes pas yang dag pa'i bden pa med na ci'i phyir yang
411a2(myang 'das): dag par bdag yod do zhes smra/de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can ni bdag med par rtog go//gzhan yong ci'i rgyu dang ci'i rkyen gyis sems can gyis bdag tu 'dzin snyam
411a3(myang 'das): du rtog ste/bdag de yod pa zhig yin na bdag de gcig tu zad dam/mang du yod snyam rtog go//gal te bdag de gcig tu zad na ci'i phyir rgyal rigs dang /bram
411a4(myang 'das): ze dang /rje'u rigs dang /gdol rigs dang /lha dang mi dang /sems can dmyal ba dang /yi dgas dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang /chen po dang chung ngu
411a5(myang 'das): dang /lang che ba dang /rgas pa yod par gyur/de bas na bdag ces bya ba ni gcig ma yin par rig gro/bdag ces bya ba de gal te med na ci'i phyir sems can
411a6(myang 'das): thams cad kyi bdag ces bya ba de gcig ste/thams cad du khyab la mtha' med do zhes smra/dre bas na gcig dang mang po gnyis ka la bdag med do//mkhas pa shes
411a7(myang 'das): rab can gyis de ltar bdag med par rtogs nas rim gyis kho zas yongs su spong bar byed pa'i 'du shes la rtog ste/'di snyam du gal te thams cad mi rtag pa'ang
411b1(myang 'das): yin la sdug bsngal ba dang badrag med pa yin na ci'i phyir kha zas kyi phyir lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi dge ba skyed par gyur/sems can gyis kha zas la chags pa'i phyir lus
411b2(myang 'das): dang dgra dang yid kyi las mi dge ba byas te/zang zing thob pa rnams gzhan dang thun mong du gyur kyang sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa myong ba na thun mong du len pa med do//
411b3(myang 'das): rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can ni gzhan yung 'di ltar rtog ste/sems can thams cad ni kha zas kyi phyir lus dang sems sdug bsngal bar gyur to//de ltar mang po'i
411b4(myang 'das): rkyen gyis kha zas thob par gyur na bdag gis ci'i phyir kha zas de la chags pa'i sems bskyed snyam du bsamau nas kha zas la chags pa'i sems skye bar mi byed do//gzhan
411b5(myang 'das): yang mkhas pa shes rab can gyis lus kyi rgyu gang yin pa brtags na/de ni kha zas kyi rkyen gyis lus skye zhing 'phel bar rtogs so//da bdag gis khyim nas khyim ma yin
411b6(myang 'das): par rab tu byung ste/tshul khrims mnos pA'ang lus 'di yongs su gtong bar byed de/de kha zas la tshogs na lus 'di ji ltar gtang bar bya snyam rtog ste/de ltar brtags
411b7(myang 'das): nas kha zas len mod kyi 'brog dgon pa'i yi dgas kyis bu'i sha la za ba tsam gyi 'du shes bskyed de/yongs su skyo ba'i sems bskyed nas de la chags par mi byed do//de
412a1(myang 'das): lta ba kha zas la skyon mang po yod par rtogs nas mthar gyis reg pa'i kha zas la 'di ltar rtog go/dper na ba'i ko ba bshus na srin bu tshad med pa skyed kyis
412a2(myang 'das): yongs su za ba ltar rtog go/gzhan yang mthar gyis bsam pa'i zas la 'di ltar rtog ste/dper na ma'i phung po chen po dang 'dra bar rtog go/rnam par shes pa'i kha zas
412a3(myang 'das): la ni mtshon shag ti sum brgyas bcugs pa dang 'dra bar rtog go/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can ni dri ltar kha zas rnam pa bzhi rtogs nas nam du'ang kha zas la
412a4(myang 'das): chags pa dang 'dod pa'i sems mi skye'o//gal te skyes na'ang mi gtsang ba la yongs su rtog go/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kha zas la chags pa yongs su spong ba'i phyir ro//
412a5(myang 'das): kha zas thams cad la mi gtsang bar shin tu rtog ste/ji ltar mi gtsang ba dang 'dra bar shin tu rtogs nas gal te kha zas bzang po rnyed dam/ngan pa rnyed na'ang lon pa'i
412a6(myang 'das): tshe/rma'am shu ba ma rungs pa la sman gyis bskus pa dang 'dra bar sems kyi chags pa dang /'dod pa'i sems nam du'ang mi skye'o//rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab
412a7(myang 'das): can gang zhig gis de lta bur rtogs na de ni kha zas kyi 'du shes yongs su spong ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la
412b1(myang 'das): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar kha zas la mi gtsang bar rtog pa na 'on te yang dag par rtog gam/sgyu ma tsam du rtog/gal te yang dag
412b2(myang 'das): par rtog na rtog pa'i kha zas de ni mi gtsang ba ma lags so//gal te sgyu ma tsam du bas na chos de yang dag par 'du shes pa lags sa mo/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
412b3(myang 'das): sprul pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar 'du shes pa de ni yang dag pa'ang ma yin la/sgyu ma'ang ma yin no//kha zas la chags pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur bas na/yang dag pa
412b4(myang 'das): sa bya'o//srin bu ma yin pA la sbyin bur mthong bas na sgyu ma zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni sgyu ma yin mod kyi yang dag par yang 'gyur ro//
412b5(myang 'das): rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong zhig bsod snyoms la 'gro bar gzas ni thog ma nas 'di snyam du sems so//bdag gis deng kha zas bzang po thob cing ngan par mi 'gyur ba dang /
412b6(myang 'das): mang du rnyed cung nyung ngur mi 'gyur ba dang /myur du thob cing thogs par mi 'gyur bar smon lam 'debs na dge slong de ni kha zas la yongs su spong ba'i 'du shes thob pa ma yin
412b7(myang 'das): te/dge ba'i chos spyod pa'ang nyin mtshan du 'gribs shing /mi dge ba'i chos ni skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dge slong gang zhig bsod snyoms la 'gro ba
413a1(myang 'das): gzas pa na thog ma 'di snyam du gang bdag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa de dag kha zas kyis chog par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa dang gang bdag la bsod
413a2(myang 'das): snyoms sbyin pa de bsod nams tshad med pa thob par gyur cig/bdag gis bsod snyoms 'di'ang gdug pa drang bcas pa'i lus 'dri gso zhing /dge ba'i chos la nan tan
413a3(myang 'das): byed par 'gyur ba dang /sbyin bdag gi phan pa drang bde ba'i don du 'gyur bar sems pa de ni dge ba spyod pa'ang nyin mtshan du skye zhing 'phel la mi dge ba'i chos kyang khad kyis
413a4(myang 'das): bying bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dge slong gang zhig de lta bur nan tan byed na/gang zag de ni yul gcig gi sbyin pa len pa ma yin par rig par bya'o//rigs kyi bu mkhas
413a5(myang 'das): pa shes rab can ni de ltar 'du shes rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pas 'jig rten la ma chags pa'i 'du shes la nan ton byed par 'gyur te/yang 'di snyam du 'jig rten thams
413a6(myang 'das): cad na/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /shi ba'i gnas ma yin pa med de/bdag gi lus 'dri ni glang du'ang mo skyes pa'i gnas med do//gral te 'jig rten na gnas
413a7(myang 'das): gcig tsam yang skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /shi ba ma yin pa'i gnas med na bdag gis ci'i phyir 'jig rten la chags par bya/'jig rten pa thams cad ni
413b1(myang 'das): gong nas gong du 'phar ba'ang med la/phyir mi ldog pa'ang med de/de bas na 'jig rten ni nges par mi rtag pa'o//de ltar mi rtag pa yin na ci'i phyir mkhas pa shes rab can gyis 'jig/
413b2(myang 'das): rten la chags par byed/sems can re res kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sdug bsngal ma myong ba'i gnas med de/mtho ris kyi tshangs pa'i lhar skyes pa nas 'du shes med 'du shes
413b3(myang 'das): me min skye mched stangs kyi lha'i bar du skyes kyang tshe 'das ma thag tu ngan song gsum du ltung ngo //rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i rgyal por skyes pa nas gzhon 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyi
413b4(myang 'das): lha'i bar du skyes kyang tshe 'phos ma thag tu byol song gi skye gnas su skyes nas seng ge dang /stag dang /spyang ki dang /bal glang dong /rta dang /ba lang dang /bong bu la sogs
413b5(myang 'das): par skye'o//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi la dbang ba longs spyod dang dbang du ldan pa'ang bsod nams zad na dbul phongs par 'gyur te/kha zas kyis mi 'tsho ba
413b6(myang 'das): la'ang shin tu brtag go//mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar shin tu rtogs nas 'jig rten la mi chags pa'i 'du shes skye'o//mkhas pa shes rab can gyis gzhan
413b7(myang 'das): yang 'di ltar rtog ste/'jig rten gyi chos khang khyim dang /dgo ba'i gos dang /kha zas dang /mal cha dang /nad kyi rkyen sngon dang /me tog dang /spos dang /phreng
414a1(myang 'das): dang /rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs dang /zang zing dang /rin po che la sogs pa ni sdug bsngal dang bral ba yin yang dngos po de dag ni rang bzhin gyis sdug
414a2(myang 'das): bsngal ba yin na/ci'i phyir sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal yongs su spong bar 'gyur/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar rtogs nas 'jig rten gyi dngos
414a3(myang 'das): bopo thams cad la chags pa'am/bde ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na gang zag gcig nad tshabs chen pos btab na/rol mo sna tshogs
414a4(myang 'das): dang /me togra dang /spos dang /phreng ba rnam pa mang po yod kyang de la 'dod pa'am tshogs pa'i sems mI skye'o//mkhas pa shes rab can gyis rtogs pa'ing de
414a5(myang 'das): dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis 'jig rten thams cad la skyabs su 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i gnas ma yin pa dang /
414a6(myang 'das): rab tu nye ba'i gnas ma yin pa dang /yid du 'ong ba'i gnas ma yin pa dang /pha rol tu byin pa'i gnas ma yin pa dang /rtag pa dang /bde ba dang /bdag dang /
414a7(myang 'das): yongs su dag pa'i chos ma yin par shin tu brtag go//gal te bdag gis de ltar 'jog rten la chags par gyur na bdag gis ji lta bur chos de dag yongs su spong
414b1(myang 'das): bar 'gyur/dper na mi zhig mun pa mi 'dod de snang ba 'tshol ba las phyir mun pa'i nang du 'gro ba dang 'dra'o//mun pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten no//snang ba zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das
414b2(myang 'das): pa'o//gal te bdag gis 'jig rten la chags te mun pa bskyed na 'od snang ba dang yongs su bral bar 'gyur ro//mun pa ni ma rig pa'o//snang ba ni shes rab bo//shes rab
414b3(myang 'das): dang snang ba'i rgyu ni 'jig rten la ma chags pa'i 'du shes yin te/'dod pa ni kun nus bcings pa yin mod kyi 'on kyang bdag ni shes rab kyi snang ba 'dod kyi/'jig rten gyi
414b4(myang 'das): chags pa ni ma 'dod do//mkhas pa shes rab can gyis shin tu brtags te/de ltar rtogs nas 'jig rten la mi chags pa'i 'du shes drang ldan pa'o//rigs kyi bu
414b5(myang 'das): mkhas pa shes rab can ni 'jig rten la ma chags pa'i 'du shes la nan tan byas nas rim gyis shi ba'i 'du shes la nan tan byed do//'tsho ba'i srog 'di la brtags na/
414b6(myang 'das): rtag tu dgra sdang ba tshad med pa snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/skad cig skad cig gis nyams par byed kyi/skye zhing 'phel bar mi byed do//dper na chu gzar po ltar mi gnas
414b7(myang 'das): pa'am/rtswa'i kha na zil pa ltar ring du mi gnas pa 'am/gsod du khrid pa dag shi ba la nye ba 'am/ba long ngam lug gshed ma'i drung du khrid pa dang 'dra'o//byang chub
415a1(myang 'das): sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis skad cig skad cig gis 'gog par rtogs pa lags/bcom

415a3(myang 'das): mda' re re zhig phyogs re rer 'phangs te/cig car 'phangs la cig car sa la ltung bar bya'o//de la grang zag cig gis 'di snyam du bdag gis skyes bu bzhis 'phangs pa'i

415a6(myang 'das): sa la 'gro ba'i yi dgas pas kyang myur ro//nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i yi dgas pas kyang rgyal chen lus bzhi'i rgyal po myur ro//rgyal chen lus bzhi'i rgyal po bas
415a7(myang 'das): kyang nyi zla'i lha myur ro//nyi zla'i lta bas kyang shin tu myur ba'i lha myur ro//shin tu myur ba'i lta bas kyang sems can gyi tshe myur ro//rigs kyi bu dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba
415b1(myang 'das): thang cig la sems can gyis 'tsho ba'i tshe skye ba dang 'grog pa bzhi brgya yod de/gang gis tshe la de ltar rtogs na de ni skad cig skad cig gis 'gog pa rtogs zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu

415b3(myang 'das): yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang mkhas pa shes rab can ni tshe dang srog la chu 'gram g.yang sa'i shing chen po dang 'dra bar rtog go/gzhan yang mi zhig nyes pa chen po
415b4(myang 'das): byas pa gsod du khrid pa las mgon med pa'am/ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge shin tu ltogs pa 'am/sbrul gdug pa rlung chen po rngub pa'am/rta shin tu skom pa chu
415b5(myang 'das): la chags pa 'am/yi dgas ma rungs pa shin tu khro ba dang 'dra bar sems can gyi 'chi bdag gi rgyal po'ang de dang 'dra bar rtog go/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can

415b7(myang 'das): sems so//bdag da rab tu byung nas tshe dang srog zhag bdun las mi thub kyang bdag gis shin tu brtson 'grus bskyed de/tshul khrims srung ba dang /sems can la
416a1(myang 'das): phan pa dang /bde ba'i don du chos ston pa ni mkhas pa shes rab can gyis shi ba'i 'du shes lnga nan tan byed pa zhes bya'o//nyin zhag bdun lta smos kyang

416a3(myang 'das): cig thang cig gi bar du bdag gis byang chub la brtson 'grus su nan tan byas te/tshul khrims kyi yongs su srung ba dang /sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du chos

416b1(myang 'das): kyang bya/yongs su dag pa zhes kyang bya/rnam par grol ba zhes kyang bya/mkhas pa shes rab can zhes kyang bya/yang dag par lta ba zhes kyang bya/pha rol tu phyin pa zhes kyang bya//

416b3(myang 'das): kyis gsungs pa'i gsung rnam pa bdun rtog pa dang /yang dag par shes pa dang /mthong ba dang /gsung rnam pa bdun la the tshom du gyur pa yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro//

416b5(myang 'das): gsum zhi bar byed pa dang /'jig rten gsum la ma chags pa ste/de ni mkhas pa shes rab can 'du shes rnam pa bcu dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//dge slong gang zhig
416b6(myang 'das): rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na dge sbyong gi mtshan ma dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sangs rgyas la tshigs
416b7(myang 'das): su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon por bstod do//'jig rten bcas la thugs brtse sman pa'i rgyal po ni//sku dang shes rab gnyis ka rnam par zhi ba ste//bdag med
417a1(myang 'das): pa yi chos la nges par bdag yod pas//de bas bla med rgyal la gus par phyag 'tshal lo//thog ma'i sems dang mthar phyin gnyis ka rnam brtags/

417a3(myang 'das): thog ma'i sems ni lha dang mi yi ston par 'gyur//nyan thos pa dang rang rgyal rnams las shin tu 'phags//sems bskyed de ni 'jig rten gsum las shin tu 'das///
417a4(myang 'das): de bas mchog tu rgyal ba'i bla na med ces bya//'jig rten mgon ni bsgrubs pas thob par rab 'gyur te//de bzhin gshegs ni gsol ba med par mgon du gshegs//

417a7(myang 'das): rnams ni bdag la phan pa'i don byed do//de bzhin gshegs ni phrin las de dag ston mdzad do//skye bo mang po'i rnam par smin pa yongs bcad de//de bas bdag dang
417b1(myang 'das): gzhan don byed la bdag phyag 'tshal//'jig rten bcas ni gnyen la phan pa'i don cher byed//de bzhin gshegs kyis don mdzad pa la byams sdang med//de bzhin

417b3(myang 'das): gshegs kyi gsung ba mdzad dang tha dad med//mdzad pa de dag thams cad 'du byed kun gcod do//de bas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes ni grags par gyur//kun nas nyon
417b4(myang 'das): mongs pa'i skyon rnams kun rtogs nas//sems can don gyi slad du bzhugs pa'ang mngon par bstan//'jig rten 'di ni rnam par grol ba yun ring yang //thugs brtse'i

417b6(myang 'das): gshegs ni sems can kun gyi yum lags pas//thugs rje chen po'i thugs de nyid ni be'u lta bu//sems can rnams la dgongs phyir sdug bsngal myong ba mdzad/

420b4(myang 'das): sbyong zhes bya/bram ze zhes kyang bya/'di ni dge sbyong dang /dge sbyong gi chos dang /bram ze dang bram ze'i chos dang ldan pa zhes kyang bya'o//kauN+Di n+ya sangs rgyas kyi chos ma gtogs

420b7(myang 'das): zhes smra/ngas kyang rtag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags kyis khyed kyang rtag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shig/de'i tshe
421a1(myang 'das): mu stegs can tshad med pa snyed de skad ces gsungs pa thos nas zhe sdang gi sems bskyed de/dge sbyong gau ta mas bdag cug la dge sbyong dang bram ze'ang med/
421a2(myang 'das): dge sbyong dang bram ze'i chos kyang med do zhes gsungs na/bdag cag gi thabs ji ltar bya zhes 'di skad ces smras so//dge sbyong gau ta ma bdago cag gi 'khor la'ang dge
421a3(myang 'das): sbyong dong dge sbyong gi chos kyang yod/bram ze dang bram ze'i chos kyang yod do//de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na kun tu rgyu gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so//
421a4(myang 'das): kye grogs pa dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni tshig ni smon pa drang 'dra ste/tha mi dad na yid ches su 'ang ci yod/'jig rten na mi sbyin pa dag kyang bar 'ga' ni glu len/bar
421a5(myang 'das): 'ga' ni gar byed/bor 'ga' ni dzu/bar 'ga' ni dgod/bar 'ga' ni ga/bar 'ga' ni bstod/gnyen dang dgra'i bye brag kyang mi phyed pa ltar/dge sbyong
421a6(myang 'das): gau ta ma'ang de dang 'dra ste/bar 'ga' ni nga rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khab tu skyes zhes smra/bar 'gra' ni ma skyes zhes smra/bor 'ga' ni skyes nas gom pa bdun por
421a7(myang 'das): zhes smra/bar 'ga' ni gar yang ma song zhes smra/bar 'ga' ni 'jig rten gyi dngos po dag chung ngu'i tshe na bslobs so zhes smra/bar 'ga'o ni thams cad mkhyen pa
421b1(myang 'das): zhes smra/bar 'ga' ni rgyal po'i khyab ni bde ba'i gnas na longs spyod cing bu'ang btsas so zhes smra/bar 'ga' ni de dag thams cad la smad de mi 'dod do zhes kyang smra/bar 'ga'
421b2(myang 'das): ni dka' ba lo drug gi bar du spyod do zhes smra/bar 'gra' ni mu stegs can gyi dka' ba spyod pa la yongs su slong /bar 'ga' ni u dum+ba ri dang a la la la sogs pa sngon ma thos
421b3(myang 'das): pa'i chos thos so zhes smra/bar 'ga' na byang chub kyi shing drung du bla na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob po zhes smra/bar 'ga' ni byang chub kyi shing drung du'ang
421b4(myang 'das): ma phyin ci'ang thob pa med do zhes smra/bar 'ga' ni nga'i lus 'di nyid mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes spro/brar 'ga' ni nga'i lus 'di 'gags pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa
421b5(myang 'das): yin no zhes sla ste/dge sbyong gau ta ma sla'o cog ni smon pa dang 'dra na/de la yid ches shing mi dger yang ci zhig yod/bram ze rnams kyis de la 'di skad ces smras so//skyes
421b6(myang 'das): bu chen po de bdag cag gis mya ngan mi bya ba'i gtolo ga la zhig yod/dge sbyong gau ta mra sngon rab tu byung nas/mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdog
421b7(myang 'das): med pa la sogs pa bstan pas bdag tsog gi nye gnas rnams kyis thos nas shin tu 'jigs pa skyes te/ji ltar na sems can dag mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang //
422a1(myang 'das): bdag med pa dang /yongs su ma dag pa yin no zhes de'i tshig la yid ma ches so//de dge sbyong gau ta mas shing sA la'i tshul 'dir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
422a2(myang 'das): mang po la rtag pa dang /bde ba dang /bdag dang yongs su dag pa'i chos yod do zhes bstan pas/bdog cag gi nye gnas rnams kyis de skad ces thos nas/bdag
422a3(myang 'das): yongs su spangs te/dge sbyong gau ta ma'i tshig la yid ches par gyur pas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mya ngan chen po skyes par gyur to//de'i tshe na gzhan yang bram ze gcig
422a4(myang 'das): cig de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//kye skas bu dag legs par nyon cig legs par nyon cig/dge sbyong gau ta ma thugs rje dang ldan no zhes bya'i tshig rdzun te yang dag
422a5(myang 'das): pa ma yin no//gal te thugs rje dang ldan no ci'i phyir bdag cag gi bla ma bdag cag gi chos kyis snying rje'i 'bras bu thob pa'ang pha rol gyi rjes su 'gro bar yid bsgyur te/
422a6(myang 'das): bdag gis bsams te da ga la bar mdzad pas/thugs rje dang ldan pa zhes byar mi rung ngo //de la gang zhig dge sbyong gr-i ta ma la 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma
422a7(myang 'das): gos so zhes smra na de'ang rdzun du smra ba yin no//gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa'o zhes smra na ci'i phyir bdag cag gi rnyed pa la sogs pa 'phrog
422b1(myang 'das): byar 'gyur/gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni rigs che ba yin no zhes smra na'ang rdzun du smra ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gna' nas ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ni byi ba chung dru gsod
422b2(myang 'das): do zhes ma thos ma mthong ngo //gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di tshe rigs chu ba yin ni ci'i phyir bdag cag la sogs pa la yongs su 'tshe bar byed/gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma la
422b3(myang 'das): mthu chen po dang ldan no zhes smra na/dI'ang rdzun du smra ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gna' nas nam mkha' lding gri rgyal po ni bya kha skegs dang 'thab bo zhes ma thos ma
422b4(myang 'das): mthong ngo //gal+le t+ye mthu tsho ba zhig yin na ci'i phyir bdug cag dang rtsod par gyur/gal te dge sbyong gau ta me ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i thugs dang ldan no zhes smran
422b5(myang 'das): du'ang rdzun du smra ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gal te ye shes de dang ldan na ci'i phyir bdag cag gis bsams pa'i sems mi shes/kye skyes bu drug bdag gis
422b6(myang 'das): sngon rgan+d+ha rabs mkhas pA las 'di skad ces thos so//nga ste lo brgya 'dis na sgyu ma sgyu can zhig 'byung ba ni dge sbyong gau ta ma la bya ste/sgyu ma sgyu can 'di ni ring por mi thogs
422b7(myang 'das): par shing sA la'i tshal 'dir med par 'gyur gyis khyed la sogs pa mya ngan ma byed cig/de'i tshe na gzhan yang gcer bu pa de la 'di skad ces smras so//kye skyes bu bdag
423a1(myang 'das): cag mya ngan byed pa ni bdag gi lus kyi phyir ram/nye glanas dang /rnyed pa dang /glugs pa'i phyir ma lags kyi/'jig rten pa gti mug gi mun pas
423a2(myang 'das): khebs par gyur te/bsod nams kyi zhing dang bsod nams kyi zhing ma yin pa mi shes nas sngon gyi rgan rabs shes pa dang ldan pa'i bram ze ni yongs su spangs nas shin
423a3(myang 'das): tu nas gzhon zhing shes pa med pa la mchod par gyur pas bdag cag mya ngan byed do//dge sbyong gro ta ma ni rig sngags le mkhas te rig sngags la mkhas pa'i
423a4(myang 'das): rkyen gyis lus gcig la lus tshad med pa snyed du sprul cing lus tshad med pa stod las kyang lus gcig tu sprul to//lus de nyid kyis skyes pa dang bud myed dang /
423a5(myang 'das): bA lang dang /lug dang /bal grang dang /rta'i gzugs su sprul te/de'ang bdag gi mthus de'i rig sngags kyi mthu med par byed nus so//dge sbyong gau ta ma'i

423b1(myang 'das): cig/mu stegs can gyi 'khor rnams kyis de la 'di skad smras so//glen pa gti mug can khyod ci'i phyir dge sbyong gau ta ma la yon tan tshad myed pa dang ldan no zhes sku/bcas
423b2(myang 'das): nas zhag bdun lon nas ma'ang shi bar gyur na de la bsod nams dang yon tan du ldan no zhes byar rung ngam/bram ze des smras pa/pha rol pos gshe'ang phyir mig sho la/
423b3(myang 'das): rol ngos brdegs kyang phyir mi rdeg pas de ni yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid de/sku la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang rdzu 'phrul tshad
423b4(myang 'das): med pa dang ldan te/dri bas na bsod nams dang yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan par rig go//nga rgyal gyi sems med pas sngar gsong por smra'o//gsung po'i tshig 'jam
423b5(myang 'das): zhing nges pas ngag rtsub po med do//lang tsho'i dus la bab kyang khro ba dang gtum pa med do//rgyal po'i yul na nor rdzas shin tu meng yang tshugs pa med par yongs su btang nas rab
423b6(myang 'das): tu byung ste/ngar snabs dang 'dra bar spangs pas bdag gis ni dge sbyong gau ta ma 'dri yon tan phun sum tshogs pa tshad myed pa dang ldan par smra'o//de nas 'khor rnams kyis 'di

424a1(myang 'das): tshad med pa dang ldan pas bdag cag ni de dang 'gran mi phod do//dge sbyong gau ta ma ni rang bzhin gyis mnyan zhing nges te dka' ba ni ma spyad kyi rgyal po'i khyab tu
424a2(myang 'das): btsas pas slob pa gang la'ang ma zhugs te tshig 'jam por slar ni rung gi/sgyu rtsal dang yi ge dang gtsug lag la sogs pa mi shes so//dam pa'i chos ni mdo tsam zhig bgros te/
424a3(myang 'das): dge sbyong gau ta ma bdag cag las rgyal na bdag cag gis de'i g.yog bya'o//bdag cag gis de las rgyal na bdag gi g.yog bya dgos so zhes smras nas de'i tshe mu stegs
424a4(myang 'das): can tshad med pa snyed lhan cig 'dus te/yul dbus 'gyur 'chang du rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i drung du lhags so//rgyal pos de dag mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so//kye skyes

424b4(myang 'das): chen po'i srang lta bu yin te yon tan thams cad kyi snod yin+da no//yon tan thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no//dam pa'i chos kyi lam lta bu'o//sa bon thams cad kyi gling
