500b7(myang 'das): rin po che sna bdun gyi phreng bas shin tu brgyan pa/me tog gi 'od dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas so//steng gi nam mkha' la gzhan yang lha'i rol mo
501a1(myang 'das): dang /gur dang /glu rnam pa mang po las kyi hud kyi hud sangs rgyas mya dran las 'das pas 'jig rten stongs so//sems can gyi mig mdongs pas
501a2(myang 'das): nyon mongs pa'i srin mo dAr te sdug bsngal gyi 'du byed rgyun mo 'chad pas na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rgyun du 'khor ro zhes grags so//de'i tshe dga' bo sems 'khrugs
501a3(myang 'das): te myos brgyal nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das sam/mya ngan las ma 'das pa mi rtogs mi shes kyi/'jig rten gyi khams sngon las gyur pa 'ba'
501a4(myang 'das): zhig mthong nas sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam zhes ma 'gags pa la dris so//ma 'gags pas smras pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan
501a5(myang 'das): las 'das so//de'i tshe dga' bos de skad ces smras pa thos nas sa la brgyal te ro bzhin du gyur nas dbugs kyang mi rgyu ste/ci'ang mi tshor ro//de nas ma 'gogs
501a6(myang 'das): pas dga' bo'i gdong la chu grangs mos btab nas bslang ngo //de nas thabs mkhas pa'i chog gis spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so//kyi hud kyi
501a7(myang 'das): hud sdug go/mya ngan chen po ma byed cig/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dul ba'i mdzad pa kun mdzad nas/lha dang /mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis bzhugs su
501b1(myang 'das): gsol kyang ma gnang gis/mya ngan chen pos sems 'khrugs par ma byed cig/kyi hud kyi hud ji ltar bya/da ji ltar bya/nang gcig tu lha dang mo'i ston pa mdzad pa'i
501b2(myang 'das): mthar phyin nas bzhugs su ma gnang ngo //da bdag cag re zhig mya ngan bsad do zhes spro ba bskyed nas/dga' ba la 'di skad ces smras so//sangs rgyas mya ngan las
501b3(myang 'das): 'das mod kyi/'on kyang ring bsrel dang /bla na med pa'i chos kyi dkon mchog 'jig rten na rtag tu bzhugs te/sems can gyi gnas dang /rten du 'gyur ba yod de/de
501b4(myang 'das): bas na bdag cag gis brtson 'grus su sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog sems can la byin te/sdug bsngal las rnam par bsgral bas sangs rgyas kyi drin la lan glan
501b5(myang 'das): par bya'o zhes smras so//de'i tshe dga' bo spro ba bskyed pa thos nas brags kyis sangs te/skud brnangs pa tsam du mchi ma blugs nas mya ngan gyis non to//de'i tshe rtswa mchog
501b6(myang 'das): gi grong khyer shing sA la'i tshal kho ra khor yug dpog tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang lha dang mes yongs su gang ba ni khab kyi rtse mo tsam la'ang sems can tshad med pa snyed yod
501b7(myang 'das): de/ba ro nas stong pa med kyang gcig la gcig mi bde zhing phan tshun gnon par 'gyur ba med do//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig grangs med pa dang /'khor
502a1(myang 'das): mang po thams cad mi dran te brgyal nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das sam/mya ngan las ma 'das pa mi rtogs mi shes kyi/sngon dang mi
502a2(myang 'das): 'dra bar ldeg cing g.yo ba 'ba' zhig mthong nas thams cad kyis ma 'gags pa la sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam zhes dris so//de nas ma 'gags pas
502a3(myang 'das): 'khor mang po rnams dang /'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi thams cad la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni yongs su mya ngan las 'dus so zhes smras so//de
502a4(myang 'das): nas 'khor grangs med pa thams cad kyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas thams cad brgyal te sa la 'gyel nas/sdug bsngal gyis shin tu gdungs pas skad kyang
502a5(myang 'das): mi phyin te/le la ni sangs rgyas kyi zham ring du thal byung shi'o//la la ni sems stor bar gyur to//la la ni lus dang sems shin tu 'bar bar gyur to//la la ni
502a6(myang 'das): gcig gi lag pa la gcig 'jus te skad brnangs pa tsamu du mchi ma blags nus ngus so//la lA ni brang la khu tshur gyis brdeg cing skad chen pos 'bod do//la la ni mgo
502a7(myang 'das): la thal mos rdebs shing rang gi skra 'bal lo//la la ni 'di skad du kye hud kyi hud sdug bsngal gyis gdungs so zhes smra'o//la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan
502b1(myang 'das): las 'das pa ha cang yang snga ches so zhes smra'o//la la ni bdag cag gi lha stor to zhe smra'o//la la ni 'jig rten stongs te sems can gyi mig madrongs so zhes smra'o//la la ni nyon
502b2(myang 'das): mongs pa'i srin po mngon du byung ngo zhes smra'o//la la ni sems can gyi dge ba'i myu gu dang sa bon 'gags so zhes smra'o//la la ni bdud kyi sde rnams dga' ste go cha'ang phud ngo zhes
502b3(myang 'das): sgra'o//la la ni bdag gi lus 'di mi rtag go zhes smod do//la la ni yang drug par spyod pas rnam par grol bar gyur to//la la ni mgon dang skyabs med par gyur to zhes smra'o//
502b4(myang 'das): lnga lA ni lus las khrag mngon du zag cing sa la 'bab par gyur to//de'i tshe rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgra skad chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams kun g.yos par gyur te/de'i tshe mi mjed
502b5(myang 'das): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po'ang /sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes nas lha'i 'khor dang bcas te bsam gtan dang po nas
502b6(myang 'das): babs nas skad chen pos ngus te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar brgyal nas so la 'gyel to//ring zhig lon nas phyir sangs te/sangs rgyas kyi spyan
502b7(myang 'das): sngar tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces dus so//bcom ldan 'das ni sngon gyi smon lam gyis/bdag cag phyir du mi mjed 'jig rten gshegs//tshad med dbang du
503a1(myang 'das): 'gyur ba'i mthu bcas nas//'ongs pa chos 'dod 'gro ba rnams kyang btul//mkhas pa'i thabs kyis ci rigs chos bstan nas//sems can mi bder
503a2(myang 'das): 'gyur ba gang yang med//srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal las bton to//mthar phyin mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam la bkod//bcom ldan sems can rnams la byams pa'i yum
503a3(myang 'das): sems can kun la snying brtse zho blud pa//dz+haiM ste thams cad nang gcig rab spangs nas//lha mi phongs pa'i mgon ma mchis par mdzad//kyi hud 'gro ba'i dge ba'i myu gu
503a4(myang 'das): yang //skye ba'i tshu ni 'bab pa'i dus ma mchis//dge ba'i myu gu khad kyis 'gags nas su//sdug pa'i las kyis bsdus nas ngan srong 'gro/'jig rten stongs so do ni
503a5(myang 'das): ji ltar bgyi//sems can yang dgra shes rab mig mdongs so//ma rig mun par 'thom zhing 'gro bas na//srid pa gsum du lhung zhing 'khor bar gyur//sems can
503a6(myang 'das): sdig pa mgon med ji ltar bgyi//ring bsrel dag la brten nas grol bar shog/de bzhin gshegs la gsol ba'i snying rje'i mthus//sdug bsngal las ni grol
503a7(myang 'das): ba'i skyabs su shog/kyi hud ji ltar 'jig rten ngan pa 'dir//bcom ldan bdag cag spangs nas mya ngan 'da'//de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas
503b1(myang 'das): Ni steng gi nam mkha' las babs nas kyi cad kyi hud ces skad chen po phyung ste ngus nas mtsho ma blags te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar brgyal nas sa la 'gyel to//de nas
503b2(myang 'das): ring zhig lon pa dang gdong phyir sangs te mya ngan gyis yid gdungs nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ngus so//bcom ldan bskul par dka' ba mdzad pa ni//
503b3(myang 'das): bdag dang 'gro ba rnams kyi slad du sngo//bla na med pa'i byang chub rab du rnyes nas//'gro ba kun la bu gcig bzhin du gso//chos sbyin spyanA ni sman gyi nang na mchog/nad gso
503b4(myang 'das): sman da'i nang na smin pa gtso//thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyisau kun bskyabs nas//bdud rtsi shes rab char ni kun la phab//shes rab nyi ma'o 'od kyis mi rig mun pa sel//ma
503b5(myang 'das): rig sems can 'phags pa'i lam yang mthong //'phags pa'i byams pa'i 'od kyis rgyud drug snang mdzad nas//srid pa rnam gsum 'od kyis reg nas rnam par grol//
503b6(myang 'das): ci yi slad du byams pa chen po'i thugs btang nas//mya ngan 'das so mi mthong ji ltar bgyi//sngon gyi thugs rje chen po'i yi dam ga re na//mchil ma bzhin du sems
503b7(myang 'das): can yongs su spangs//bdag la sogs te sems can thams cad ni//ji ltar be'u dag mas ber nges par 'chi ba bzhin//'khor bzhi gcig gi lag la gcig 'jus
504a1(myang 'das): nas//brang brdung ngu ba'i skud kyis 'jig rten gsum yang g.yos//kyi hud kyi hud skyid par 'khor ba 'di thams cad//thams cad nang gcig tu ni skyabs
504a2(myang 'das): ma mchis par gyur//re sdug bdag cag bsod nams zad pa rnams//dge ba'i myu gu tshig pa rlan pa'i dus ma mchis//chos kyi dkon mchog ring bsrel 'od zer gyis//
504a3(myang 'das): snang bar mdzad cing srid pa gsum las grol bar shog/kyi hud shin tu sdug go bdog cig rnams//nam zhig slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur//de'i
504a4(myang 'das): tshi ma 'gags pa'ang mya ngan gyis gdungs te ngus nas lus kyang 'dar bar gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar pus ma btsugs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bstod do//
504a5(myang 'das): sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal pos bdag cag rab tu gsos//bdag cag chos kyi skom blung chos kyi sku yong bskyed//sems can chos kyi sku yang mngon par ma grub cing //
504a6(myang 'das): shes rab 'tsho ba'i tshogs kyang yong ma bsngags//rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis rab bstan cing //'khor rnams thos nas byang chub rtogs par mdzad pa'i rigs
504a7(myang 'das): rtag tu byams chen kha dog lnga yi 'od bkye zhing //'khor rnams 'od kyis reg nas rnam par grol bar mdzod//ci yi slad du yongs su mya ngan 'das gshegs nas//sdug
504b1(myang 'das): bsngal spyod pa'i sems can ci la 'jug par bgyi//kyi hud bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa chen po spangs//bdag cag mgon ma mchis pas nges par 'chi//bcom ldan
504b2(myang 'das): 'dras kyi sgo thabs su bstan par 'tshal mod kyi//bdag cag mya ngan mi bgyid pa yi gtol ma mchis//'khor bzhi myos shing 'khrugs te brgya lnga nas sems kyang stor//du
504b3(myang 'das): ba'i skad kyis gnam sa 'jig rten gsum yang 'gul//bcom ldan nyag gcig bde ba chen po la bzhugs na//'gro ba mang po'i sdug bsngal chen po ji ltar bgyi//bcom
504b4(myang 'das): ldan 'das pa'i dus na bdag cag rnams kyi phyir//bskal pa mang por dbu dang phyag dang zhabs kyang btang //bla na med pa'i byang chub mi ngon par sangs rgyas nas//ring por mi
504b5(myang 'das): bzhugs mya ngan las ni 'da' bar gshegs//bdag cag 'khor bzhi ma rog thibs por gnas pas na//bdud kyi rgyal po dga' zhing spro bas go rdo 'dra bor//kyi cung
504b6(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po yis//ring bsrel byams pa'i 'od kyis bdag cag bskyabs par shog/'khor bzhi po la bcom ldan thugs brtse'i phyir//chos kyi
504b7(myang 'das): dkon mchog phan pa zad mi shes par shog/bdag cag rnams ni 'phral du 'chi bar ma gyur te//'tsho ba'i lhag ma 'di tsam gyis ni ci zhig nus//kyi hud shin tu sdug
505a1(myang 'das): bsngal bzod par dka'//da ni slan chad bcom ldan mthong ba'i dus ma mchis//de'i tshe dga' bo bags kyis sangs nas//thal mo mgro la rdebs shing
505a2(myang 'das): brang la khu tshur gyis brdegs nas skad brnangs shing sdug bsngal lus kyis mi bzod pa tsam du ngus nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar pus mo btsugs te ngu ba'i tshigs su bcad
505a3(myang 'das): pa 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag sngon bcom ldan 'das dang smon lam mthu gcig pas//mthun par gcig tu shAg gi rigs su skyes par gyur//de bzhin gshegs
505a4(myang 'das): pa mngon par byang chub sangs rgyas nas//bdag gis lo ni nyi shu lhag gcig g.yog kyang bgyis//dad pa'i sems kyis bsnyen par bgyi bla mo ngoms bzhin//nang
505a5(myang 'das): gcig bor nas yongs su mya ngan 'dra' bar gshegs//kyi hud kyi hud sdug bsngal chen pos gdungs par gyur//yun du sdug bsngal gyis ni sems kyang rab tu
505a6(myang 'das): gzir//bdag gi lus kyang srid pa'i dra ba las ma grol//ma rig pa yi sgo nga las kyang phyir ma byung //bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rig sgo nga ma bcag par//ci yi
505a7(myang 'das): slad du yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar gshegs//bdeg ni gsar du btsas pa'i bu dang mtshungs pa la//ma yis bor na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'chi bar 'gyur//ci
505b1(myang 'das): yi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs spangs nas//nyag cig khams gsum las ni 'das nas bde bar bzhugs//bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis 'gyod cing mthol ba ni//
505b2(myang 'das): dgung lo nyi shu'i bar du zham rid 'tshal ba na//spyod lam bzhi po le lo'i dbang du gyur pas na//'phags pa'i thugs dang 'gel zhing mnyes par ma bgyis pa//yang dag
505b3(myang 'das): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po yis//bdag la bdud rtsi stsal cing bde ba mdzad par shog/bdag gis phyi ma'i bskal pa mtha' yi bar du yang //rtag tu bcom
505b4(myang 'das): ldan 'das kyi zham ring byed par shog/bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis//thams cad 'jig rten khams su bdag ni skyob par shog/kyi hud kyi hud tshigs
505b5(myang 'das): gis brjod mi nus//'phags pa'i drin smrar skad kyang mi phyin to//de yi tshe klung gang+gA grangs med pa bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' dang /'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi
505b6(myang 'das): thams cad gcig gi lag pa la gcig gis 'jus nas shin tu ngu zhing cho nges 'dren pa las so so nas spro ba bskyed de/ci nus kyis grangs med pa'i lha'i spos dang /lha'i
505b7(myang 'das): me tog man+da ra ba dang /man+da ra ba chen po dang /many+dzu sha ka dang /many+dzu sha ka chen po dang /grangs med pa'i lha dong me'i 'jig rten gyi rgya mtsho ngos kyi tsan+dan dang /a ka ru dang /
506a1(myang 'das): rnam pa brgya stong snyod kyi spos sbyar ma dang /grangs med pa'i byug spos dang /spos chu dang /rin po che'i gdugs dang /rin po che'i rgya la mtshan dang /
506a2(myang 'das): rin po che'i ba dan dang /mu tigr-i dang /do shal nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phrab nas mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi
506a3(myang 'das): grong khyer gyi skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo thams cad kyis kyang shin tu drus nas so so nas grangs med pa'i me tog dang /spos dang /rgyal mtshan
506a4(myang 'das): dang /gdugs la sogs pa snga ma bas shin tu lhag par sbyar te de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar phab nas mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi
506a5(myang 'das): lha'i 'khor dang bcas te shin te ngus nas so so nas grangs med pa'i me tog dang spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad sdo ma bas sum 'gyur gyis lhag pa bshams
506a6(myang 'das): nas dus bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags te mchod pa byas so//gnam rim pa lnga'i lhas kyang de bzhin du snga ma bas shin tu lhag pa bshams//
506a7(myang 'das): gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma bas shin tu lhag pa bshams nas mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe rtsa
506b1(myang 'das): mchog gi grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /bud meng mchim blags to ngus nas/'drud ji ltar btang ba mi shes nas dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so//de bzhin gshegs
506b2(myang 'das): ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das ni ji lta bu'i tshul du 'dad btang bar bgyi/de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug gis gong du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bzhin du/'khor
506b3(myang 'das): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'dad btang ba bzhin bya'o zhes smras so//de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad 'dus te grong khyer du zhugs nas lcags kyi sgrom byas te/rin
506b4(myang 'das): po che sna bdun gyis brgyan nas/rin thang med pa'i ras dkar po bzang po yug stong deng grangs med pa'i shing bal shin tu 'jam pa'ang bshams so//gzhan yang grangs
506b5(myang 'das): med pa'i shing tsan+dan drang /a ka ru dang /gzhan yang khri phrag brgya stong snyed kyi spos sbyar me dang /spos kyi 'da' gu dang /spos chu dang /gdugs dang /ba dran dang /me
506b6(myang 'das): tog la sogs pa/sprin ltar nam mkha' la yongs su grang ba mtho khyad ri rab lhun po tsam pa shams so//de lta bu dag bshams nas mchi ma blugs te de bzhin gshegs
506b7(myang 'das): pa'i spyan sngar phab nas/mya ngan gyis yid gdungs bzhin du mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad dang /'khor mang po thams cad kyang mchi ma
507a1(myang 'das): blags te ngus nas/gzhan yang tshad med pa snyed kyi spros dang /me tog dang /rgyal mtshan dang /gdugs la sogs te mchod pa'i yo byad sprin lta bung
507a2(myang 'das): nam mkha' yongs su gang bar bshams nas gcig gi lag pa gcig 'jus te/byang la khu tshur gyis rdeg cing cho dri'i sgras stong chen po'adra g.yos te/de bzhin gshegs
507a3(myang 'das): pa'i spyan sngar phab nas mchod pa'i yo byad kyis mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams skad brnangs pa tsam gyis ngus nas/bkur stir bya ba'i phyir so so nas ras
507a4(myang 'das): dkaro po'i sleb mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bteg ste/lcags kyi sgrom gyi nang du bcug nas mar bsung can gang bar blugs te sgrom gyi kha bcad do//de'i tshe rtswa mchog
507a5(myang 'das): gi grong khyer gyi pho mos thams cad kyang bsod nams 'dod pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lha dang /mo dang /'khor mang pos de bzhin
507a6(myang 'das): gshegs pa'i pur sgrom 'degs su ma bcug gi/kun gyis bgros nas zla med pa'i gyad stobs po che bzhis 'degs par byas so//gyad bzhi pos gos dang rgyan bkrol
507a7(myang 'das): te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bur sgrom 'degs pa'i phyir grong khyer gyi nang du 'ongs te/mchod pa byas nas mthu ci yod pas btog kyang ma theg go//de nas grong khyer de'i gyad
507b1(myang 'das): stobs po che brgyad kyis pur sgrom 'dog par byas te/so so'i gos dang rgyun bkrol nas mchod pa byas te mthu ci yod pas rtsal kyang ma thog go/de nas grong khyer de'i stobs po che bcu drug
507b2(myang 'das): gos 'deg par byas te gres dang rgyan bkrol nas/sangs rgyas kyi sgrom 'deg par rtsal kyang theg par ma gyur to//de'i tshe ma 'gags pas stobs po che rnams la 'di skad ces
507b3(myang 'das): smras so//ji ste grong khyer 'di'i nang gi skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom grong khyer gyi nang du bkur bar rtsol yang
507b4(myang 'das): mi theg na/khyed 'ba'o zhig gis mi theg pa lta ci smos te/khyed rnams kyis 'khor mang po dang lha rnams kyi stobs kyis bstang bar gsol te sgom bteg na/grong khyer du
507b5(myang 'das): bkur nus par 'gyur ro zhes ma 'gags pas smras ma thag tu/de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dam pa dang /grangs med pa'i me toglau dang /
507b6(myang 'das): spos dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /lha'i rol mo bshams nas/lha'i 'khor dang bcas te shin tu ngus nas nam mkha' las 'phags te/'phags pa'i pur
507b7(myang 'das): sgrom la mchod pa byed do//gnam rim pa drug gi lha dang /gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyang brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug dang 'dra bar pur sgom la mchod pa byed do//de'i tshe bcom
508a1(myang 'das): ldan 'das kun la thugs rjes khyab par mdzad cing /'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyi mnyam par bsod nams khyad par med par mdzad pa'i phyir shing
508a2(myang 'das): sA la'i tshal nas/pur sgrom shing ta la gcig gi srid du steng grin ma mkha' lalo 'phags nas gshegs par gyur gyi/rtswa mchog go grong khyer gyi mi thams cad dang /
508a3(myang 'das): 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang /mi dang /'khor thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgrom bteg par ma gyur to//de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug 'khor rnams dang
508a4(myang 'das): bcas te/rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs chen po'i rin po che'i ka ba bzhi dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun gyi do shal gyis ngos bzhi brgyan pa/steng gi nam mkha' las de bzhin
508a5(myang 'das): glashegs pa'i sgrom khebs par byas grangs med pa'i spos dang /me tog dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /do shal dang /lha'i rol mo dang /dar gyi lda ldi sna tshogs
508a6(myang 'das): kyis nam mkha' la mchod pa byas so//gnam rim pa drug gi bar gyi lha dang /gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyang mchod pa'i yo byad brgya byin pas lhag par bshams
508a7(myang 'das): nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgom la mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad kyis/de bzhin gshegs po'i pur sgrom steng gi nam mkha'
508b1(myang 'das): la 'phags pa mthong nas brang brdungs te skad chen po phyung nas ngus so//de'i tshe lha dang mi thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgom la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun
508b2(myang 'das): dang /mu tih+la dang /me tog dang /spos dang /do shal dang /dar gyi lda ldi rnam pa mang po sprin bzhin du nam mkha'i khams yongs su grang bar byas te shin tu ngus nas/de bzhin
508b3(myang 'das): gshegs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi pur sgrom la mchod de/thams cad skad mthun par kyi hud kyi hud bdag cag la bsod nams ma mchis pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bur sgom
508b4(myang 'das): ma theg ste/bdag cag lnga mgon skyabs ma mchis/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skul ba ma mchis so zhes smras so//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi gser gyi pur sbram shing sA la'i tshal
508b5(myang 'das): gyi nam mkha' las dal gyis gshogs te/rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi nub sgor zhugs so//de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer na gnas pa'i dge bsnyen ma thams cad dang /byang
508b6(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos blangs med pa/lha dang /mi dong /'khor mang pos steng gi nam mkha' dang /sA lo yongs su gang bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur
508b7(myang 'das): sgrom gyi phyi bzhin dong nas/gcig gi lag pa la gcig gis 'ju zhing skad chen po phyung ste ngus nas brang la khu tshur gyis brdegs te/so so nas grangs med pa'i me tog dang /
509a1(myang 'das): spyos dang /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /bdun dang /gdugs kyis sa'i steng dang /nam mkha' yang yongs su grang bar bshams te/de bzhin gshegs
509a2(myang 'das): pa'i pur sgrom la mchod par byed do//rtsa mchog gi grong khyer ni ngos gcig kyang dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad yod do//de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi
509a3(myang 'das): pur sgom steng gi nam mkha' la dal gyis gshegs te/rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi shar sgo nas byung nas/g.yas phyogs nas 'khor te grong khyer gyi lho sgor zhugs so//de
509a4(myang 'das): nas bags kyis nam mkha' la gshegs te/byang sgo nas g.yas phyogs su 'khor te nub sgor zhugs so//de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du bskor nas steng gi nam mkha'
509a5(myang 'das): la dral gyis gshegs te/phyir yang nub sgor zhugs nas shar sgor byung ste/g.yas nas bskor nas byang sgor zhugs so//de nas yang nam mkha' la dal gyis
509a6(myang 'das): gshegs te/lho sgor byung nas g.yas nus bsgyur te byang sgor zhugs nas lan bzhi bskor to//de bzhin du g.yas phyogs nas grong khyer rtswa mchog lan bdun gyi bar du
509a7(myang 'das): bskor to//de'i tshe rin po che sna bdun gyi pur sgrom grong khyer gyi nang du zhugs pa na 'khor mang po thams cad mchim blags te ngus nas so so nas grangs med pa'i spos kyi shing
509b1(myang 'das): tsan+dan dang /rin po che'i spos kyi shing ri mo dang bsung du ldan pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun bro bar byed pa thogs shing gzhan yang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /
509b2(myang 'das): gdugs dang /spos dang /me tog dang /do shal grangs med pa bshams te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dad mdzad pa'i gnas su mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i mgon
509b3(myang 'das): po chen po dang /lha'i 'khor dang bcas te ngus nas lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan dang /a ka ru phyi nang kun bsung dang ldan pa/bsung gis 'dad pa sboms shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam lnga brgya dang /
509b4(myang 'das): de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i spos dang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /rin po che'i gdugs dam pa dang /me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa bshams te/mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'dad
509b5(myang 'das): mdzad pa'i gnas su lhags so//gnam rim pa gnyis kyi lhas ni shing stong bshams so//gnam rim pa gsum pa'i lhas ni shing nyis stong bshams so//rim pa bzhi
509b6(myang 'das): pa'i lhas ni shing sum stong bshams so//rim pa lnga pa'i lhas ni shing bzhi stong bshams so//rim pa drug pa'i lhas ni shing lnga stong snyed bshams te/so so nas ba dan
509b7(myang 'das): dang /me tog la sogs pa thogs te ngus nas mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'dad mdzad pa'i gnas su lhags so//de'i tshe gzugs yod pa'i khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams
510a1(myang 'das): kyi lha rnams ni spros dang /me tog 'ba' zhig thogs te/'ad mdzad pa'i gnas su lhags nas mchod pa byed do//de nas 'jig rten du bcas pa 'khor
510a2(myang 'das): mang po rnams kyang /so so nas spyos tsan+dan gyi shing dang /A ga ru dang /me tog dang /spos dang /ba dan dang /gdug sngo la sogs pa thogs te/dris nas mchod pa bya
510a3(myang 'das): ba'i phyir 'ad kyi gnas su lhags so//de'i tshe ma 'gags pa mig mchi mas gang ste drag tu ngus nas/lha dang mi rnams las shing tsan+dan dang /a gA ru drug stong snyed ri mo dong //
510a4(myang 'das): bsrung du ldan pa/kun tu shin tu mdzad pa bslangs nas 'dad kyi gnas su bzhag go/mtsho ma dros pa ngos bzhi chu zheng gab pa dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de/gtsang po chen po
510a5(myang 'das): bzhi 'bab po//bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa na gtsang po gang+gA'i byang phyogs kyi 'gram na tsan+dan gyi shing drung gcig skyes te/sboms khyad shing rta'i
510a6(myang 'das): 'khor lo tsam la gnam 'phang du shing tA la bdun srid de/bsung shin tu mdzad pas de bzhin gshegs pA la mchod pa byed do//shing de'i lha yang shing de dang cig cur
510a7(myang 'das): skyes te/rtag tu spos des sangs rgyas kun la mchod par byed do//sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa na tsan+dan gyi shing de'ang lo ma dang shun pa lhags nas skams te shing gi lha
510b1(myang 'das): yang der shi'o//de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis shing de blangs nas 'dad kyi gnas su bskyal te mchod pa byas so//sa gzhi de ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dad kyi gnas te/
510b2(myang 'das): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus gnas de nyid du 'dad mdzad do//gnas de na sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi rin po che'i mchod rten yang grangs med pa zhig yod
510b3(myang 'das): dro//gnas de ni rdo rje ltar mi 'jig cing shin tu brtan pa'o//de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgromi nam mkha' la dal gyis gshegs te 'dad kyi gnas su phyin pa dang /byags
510b4(myang 'das): kyis je dma' je dma' nas rin po che sna bdun gyi khri dar gyi lda ldi dang /do shal yongs su brgyan pa la gshegs te/de nas de'i bar du zhag bdun 'das so//de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi
510b5(myang 'das): grong khyer gyi skyes pa dang /bud med thams cad dang /glangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi lha thams cad mya ngan gyis yid
510b6(myang 'das): gdungs te rab tu ngus nas ba dran dang /gdugs drang /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /spos dang /me tog la sogs pa thogs te/sangs rgyas kyi pur sgrom gyi phyi bzhin zhag bdun gyi
510b7(myang 'das): bar du 'brang yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis lha dang mi thams cad la skom pa dang bkres pa'i 'du shes med de/zas mi sems kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i phyir ngu ba
511a1(myang 'das): 'ba' zhig byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i bur de ltar zhag bdun lon nas sgom gyi nang nas phyir dbyung ba na rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi skyes pa dang /bud med
511a2(myang 'das): dang /'khor grangs med pa thams cad kyis ngus pa'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams kyang g.yos nus/gzhan yang me tog dang /spos dang /lha'i rgyalo mtshan dang /gdugs dang /
511a3(myang 'das): grangs med pa'i lha'i rol mo mang pos sangs rgyas kyi pur la ngus te mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams mchi ma blags nas ras dkar po 'jam pos lag pa bkris te
511a4(myang 'das): bsti stang dang bcas pa'i sems kyis rin po che'i sgrom nus de bzhin grwa shegs pa'i sku graser bco ma'i kha dog dang ldan pa/mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad
511a5(myang 'das): cur ldan pa/rdo rje ltar mi 'jig pa'i chos can dal gyis phyung ste/rin po che sna bdun gyi khri la bzhag go/de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams shin tu ngus pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig
511a6(myang 'das): rten gyi khams kun g.yos par gyur to//gzhan yang spos dang /me tog dang /gdugs dang /rol mo la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas ngus so//'khor mang po rnams ngu
511a7(myang 'das): zhing mchi ma blags nas so so nas spos chu dang /byug spos grangs med pa snyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang
511b1(myang 'das): ldan pa/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa dang ldan pa/rdo rje lta bur mi 'jig pa/gser bco ma'i kha dog lta bu/dbu dang zhabs kyi bar du bkrus so//de nas
511b2(myang 'das): rin po che'i sgrom mang yongs su dag par bkrus so//de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams shin tu ngus te mchim blags nas lha'i spos dang /rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gis gtor nas grangs
511b3(myang 'das): med pa'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /gdugs dang /ba dan nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang bas mchod pa byas nas ngus so//de nas 'khor mang po rnams dus bzhin du grangs
511b4(myang 'das): med pa'i shing bal thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser bco ma lta bu dkris so//de ltar shing bal gyis dkris pa'i steng du rin thang med pa'i ras dkar po yug stong gis de
511b5(myang 'das): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dkris so//de ltar dkris nas 'khor mang po rnams brgyal ba tsam du shin tu ngus nas/gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog dang /spos dang /rin po che'i
511b6(myang 'das): rgyal mtshan dang /rin+da po che'i gdugs dang /lce'i rol mo la sogs pas mchod pa byas te ngus so//de nas 'khor mang po rnams dus bzhin du so so nas ras dkar po sleb mos
511b7(myang 'das): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bteg nas rin po che'i sgrom gyi nang du bcug ste/mar bsung can gyis bkang nas sgrom gyi kha bcad do//de nas 'khor mang po rnams shin tu ngu ba'i sgra
512a1(myang 'das): 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu grags par gyur te/gzhan yang me tog dang /spos dang /ba ngan dang /gdugs dang /rol mo la sogs pas rin po che'i sgrom la
512a2(myang 'das): mchod nas ngus so//de nas 'khor mang po thams cad kyis gsogs pa'i spos kyi shing dri bsung shin tu mdad pa ri rab lhun po tsam brtsigs te bcer ba spos kyi khang pa brtsegs ma
512a3(myang 'das): lta bur gyur nas ngos bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan cing gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /spos dang /me tog dang /do shal dang /dar gyi lda ldi sprin lta bur
512a4(myang 'das): nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang ba tsam gyis brgyan nas lha'i rol mo'i mchod pa byas so////'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo///
512a5(myang 'das): bam po lnga bcu drug pa ste tha ma//de nas lha dang /mi dang /'khor rnams kyis pur sgom bteg ste/spos kyi khang pa brtsegs ma'i steng du bzhag pa na shin tu skad chen po phyung
512a6(myang 'das): ste brang brdungs nas ngus pa'i sgra chen pos stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grags shing g.yos par gyur te/gzhan yang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /gdugs dang /spros
512a7(myang 'das): dang /me tog dang /lha'i rol mos mchod nas ngus so//de nas bsti stang bya ba'i phyir so so nas ras dkar po'i sleb mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgom bteg ste/shin
512b1(myang 'das): tu brgyan pa'i spos kyi shing gi steng du bzhag nas cho nges 'don zhing brgyal to//de nas phyir sangs nas 'di skad du kyi hud kyi hud 'jig rten na mgon dang skyabs med par gyur to zhes smras nas mchi
512b2(myang 'das): ma blags te/me tog dang /spos dang /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /gdugs dang /lha'i rol mos mchod pa byas so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgom spos kyi
512b3(myang 'das): shing gi stong du bzhag ste/me gtong ba na 'khor mang po thams cad shin tu ngus te/stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grags par gyur te/ngus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur
512b4(myang 'das): sgrosgom dri la mchod pa byas so//de nas 'khor mang po rnams ngus nas rin po che sna bdun gyi spros kyi sgron mo shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas nas thams cad
512b5(myang 'das): du gcig tu skad chen po phyung ste ngus pas stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos nas me tog dang spos kyis yongs su mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe rin po che'i sgron me spos
512b6(myang 'das): kyi shing brtsigs pa'i drung du phyin ma thag tu rang shri'o//de nas lha thams cad kyis kyang bla na med pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me chen po thogs te/me'i 'od kyis kun tu snang bar byas nas
512b7(myang 'das): dus bzhin du spos kyi shing brtsigs pa'i drung du phyin ma thag tu me de'ang rang shi'o//de nas rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad kyang rgya mtsho'i nang gi me rin po che sna bdun gyi sgron ma'i 'od zer grangs
513a1(myang 'das): med pa dang ldan pa thogs te/spos kyi shing brtsigs pa la bsregs na me de'ang rang shi'o//de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams shin tu ngus nas mchod pa thams cad
513a2(myang 'das): kyis mchod te/de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad pa ci'i mthar ma phyin na/spos kyi shing la me mched du ma btub pa ma rtogs so//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po
513a3(myang 'das): kun la khyab pa 'od srung gi 'khor la gzhes te gdod zhugs kyis bzhin to//de'i tshen 'od srung chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang bya rgod 'phungs pa'i ri la 'khod do//ri de rta mchog
513a4(myang 'das): grong khyer nas dpag tshad lnga bcu yod de/de na lus dang sems rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa las dngangs na sau lus kyang 'dar zhing g.yos so//de nas ting nge
513a5(myang 'das): 'dzin las byung ste bltas ni sa dang ri kun rab tu g.yos pa mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das par shes te/'khor rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//nga'i
513a6(myang 'das): ston pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun lon te/sgrom gyi nang du'ang btsug go//kyi hud kyi hud myur du de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bAr dong ngo //gal te
513a7(myang 'das): zhugs la bzhin par gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan pa yongs su dag pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes smras
513b1(myang 'das): nas 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang bya ba'i phyir/rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la ma song gi/'khor dang bcas te lam du zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bar myur du ngu
513b2(myang 'das): bzhin du song nas zhag bdun gyis rtswa mchog gi grong khyer du phyin to//grong khyer gyi shar sgor bram ze zhig lha'i me tog gcig thogs te 'ongs pa dang phrad nas 'od srung gis de la kyai
513b3(myang 'das): ga las 'ongs zhes dris so//des smras pa/bdag sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa zhugs la bzhin pa'i gnas nas 'ongs so//zhes smras so//'od srung gis me tog 'di dag ga
513b4(myang 'das): las rnyed ces dris na zhugs la bzhin pa'i gnas su lha'i me tog 'di rnyed do zhes smras so//'od srung gis me tog 'di kho bo bslang ngo zhes smras na mi rung ngo //bdag 'di gnyen pa
513b5(myang 'das): rnams bsten cing khyim du mchod par 'gro'o zhes smras so//'od srung gis cung blta'o zhes smras nas lag gis bslangs te/spyi bo la bzhag ma thag der brgyal te sA la 'gyel
513b6(myang 'das): to//ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sangs nas ngus te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa/gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu da phyin chad mi mthong ngo zhes
513b7(myang 'das): smras nas 'khor dang bcas te grong khyer rtsa mchog gi byang sgor zhugs te/grong khyer gyi nang du phyin nas dge slong gi gnas zhig tu zhugs nas dge slong dag cig 'dus shing 'khod
514a1(myang 'das): padag mthong ngo //dge slong de dag gis 'od srung la khyod lam ring po nas 'ongs na nyon mongs shing mi bde bar ma gyur tam/bde bar 'dug la bsod snyoms
514a2(myang 'das): sdod cig ces smras so//'od srung gis smras pa/khro bo'i ston pa chen po mya ngan las 'das na/bdag blod pa ci zhig yod de/'dir bde bar 'dug cing bsod snyoms bsdad
514a3(myang 'das): du rung ngam/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/khyod kyi ston pa su yin/'od srung gis smras pa/ci khyed mi shes sam/kyi hud bdag gi ston pa ni sangs rgyasra bcom ldan 'das
514a4(myang 'das): yin te/da yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//dge slong rnams kyis de skad ces thos nas so so nas 'di skad ces smras so//legs so legs so//de bzhin gshegs pa
514a5(myang 'das): Na 'jig rten na bzhugs na tshul khrims dam pas bdag cag mi bzod de/bdag cag de bzhin du spyod mi nus pa las/nga mya ngan las 'das nas tshul khrims bsdams pa'ang
514a6(myang 'das): da lhod par gyur gyis re zhig ma rings par bsod snyoms sdod cig ces smras so//sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi sku brlabs kyis lha rnams dang /'od srung gi 'khor rnams rna ba 'grags
514a7(myang 'das): par byas pas dge slong sdig can rnams kyis smras pa'i tshig thos par mi gyur gyi/'od srung 'ba'o zhig gis thos so//de nas 'od srung 'khor rnams dang bcas te shin tu
514b1(myang 'das): dus nas sangs rgyas ga na bar myur bar song ngo //de'i tshe 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te 'di snyam du bsams so//bdag cag gis ji lta bur mchod pa'i yo byad rnyed cing sangs
514b2(myang 'das): rgyas la mchod par 'gyur snyam bsams nas 'od srung gis 'di skad ces smras so//bdag kyang grong khyer 'dir skyes te/mchod pa'i yo byad bslangs na rnyed par 'gyur yang
514b3(myang 'das): dag snyam nas 'khor rnams dang bcas te grong khyer der mthar gyis bslangs so//mthar gyis bslangs nas raso dkar po bzang po yug stong yang rnyed/dri ma yin pa gzhan
514b4(myang 'das): yang shing bal grangs med pa dang /tshad med pa'o me tog rin po che dang /byug spos dang /spos chu dang /spos gyi mar dang /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /rin po che'i gdugs
514b5(myang 'das): dang /ba dan dang /rol mo dang /do shal rnam pa sna tshogs dang /der gyi lda ldi la sogs pa rnyed do//de nas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te mchod pa'i yo byad ci rnyed pa thogs
514b6(myang 'das): nas myur bar grong khyer gyi nub sgor byung nas 'od srung gis zhugs la bzhin pa'i gnas na/'khor mang po thams cad shin tu ngu zhing cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra'ang thos/kun gyis brgya
514b7(myang 'das): byin dbang phyug la de mchod pa ni byas na bzhin pa'i me ga las rnyed pas 'dri ba dang brgya byin gyis 'khor mang po rnams la re zhig 'od srung la bsdad dgos so zhes bya ba'ang thos te/
515a1(myang 'das): brgya byin gyis 'khor mang po rnams la de skad ces smras pa thos ma thag tu 'od srung chen po 'khor dang bcas te ngu bzhin du der lkugs so//'khor gyi dkyil
515a2(myang 'das): 'khor rnams kyis go phye nas 'od srung gis rkyang nas sangs rgyas kyi pur sgrom mthong ba dang /'khor drang bcas te phyag btsal nas shin tu ngus te cho nges btab nas brgyal lo//
515a3(myang 'das): de nas ring zhig lon nos phyir sangs te bgos kyis drung du bsnyen nas/'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smos so//bdag gis ji lta bur 'phags pa'i pur sgrom dbye
515a4(myang 'das): bar bgyi/'khor rnams kyis smras pa/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de ring du zhag bdun gsum lon te/nga tsam zhig pa snyam na ji ltar sgrom do bye
515a5(myang 'das): bar bya/'od srung gis smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rdo rje lta bur swa bA/brtan pa/rtag pa/bde ba/yongs su dag pa/mi 'jig pa ste/yon tan gyi bsung
515a6(myang 'das): shin tu ma dad pa/tsan+dan gyi ri lta bu yin no zhes smras nas shin tu ngus te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom gyi drung du bsnyen to//de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
515a7(myang 'das): rje chen po kun la snyoms pas 'od srung gi phyir pur sgom gyi kha rang bye nas ras dkar po stong gis dkris pa dang shing bal gyi dkris pa'ang rang grol te/mtshan sum cu rtsa
515b1(myang 'das): gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/gser bco ma'i kha dog lta bu/sra zhing brtan pa'i sku 'od srung la mngon par bstan to//'od srung 'khor dang bcalnga pas de lta
515b2(myang 'das): bu dag mthong nas shin tu ngus te brgyal nas 'gyel to//de nas ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sangs nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du 'khor rnams dang bcas te/spos kyi shing dartsigs
515b3(myang 'das): pa la 'dzegs nas/pur sgrom la shin tu bsnyen te cho nges btab nas me tog dang /spos dang /rgyal mtshan dang /gdugs dang /ba dan dang /do shul dang /rol mo la
515b4(myang 'das): sogs pas mchod de/byug spos dang /spos chus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gasder btso ma'i khwa dog lta bu bkrus nas spos kyis bdugs shing /me tog gis gtor te dus
515b5(myang 'das): nas mchod pa byas so//de ltar bkrus nas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te ci rnyed pa'i shing bal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dkris so//de'i steng du shing bal rnying gis
515b6(myang 'das): kyang dkris so//de'i steng du bslangs pa'i ras dkar po yug stong gis dkris so//de'i steng du ras rnying pa stong gis kyang dkris so//de ltar rim pa du mar de bzhin gshegs
515b7(myang 'das): pa'i sku dkris nas pur sgrom gyi kha'ang bcad de/rin po che sna bdun gyis shin tu brgyan te/de'i tshe 'od srung shin tu ngus nas 'khor dang bcas te g.yas phyogs nas lan 'dun
516a1(myang 'das): bskor te/mig mchi mas grang bzhin du thal mo sbyar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha du sa la btsugs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so//kyi hung
516a2(myang 'das): kyi hud 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das//bdag ni sdug bsngal shin tu gdungs par gyur//thugs rje chen pos bdag la mi gzhes par//ci yi slad du myur bar mya ngan 'das//
516a3(myang 'das): bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la snyoms par zhugs pa na//kun tu bltas kyang de bzhin gshugs ma mthong //bltas na bcom ldan mya ngan 'das mthong nas//shin tu 'dar te
516a4(myang 'das): sems kyang dang nges par gyur//'jig rten khams kyang mun par gyur nas su//ri dang sa chen dag kyang rab tu g.yos//bcom ldan mya ngan 'das par der rtogs te//myur
516a5(myang 'das): du mchis kyang bcom ldan 'das ma mthong //bcom ldan thugs rjes bdag la ma khyab pas//bdag gis sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das ma mthong //bdag la bstan pa gsung
516a6(myang 'das): gcig ma bzhag pas//bdag la mgon ma mchis na cal gnas//bcom ldan bdag ni sdug bsngal shin tu gdungs//sems kyang myos nas shin tu smad par gyur///
516a7(myang 'das): bdag gis bcom ldan dbul phyag 'tshal lam//'on te bcom ldan dpal be'u la phyag 'tshal//'on te 'phags pa'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lam//'on te bcom ldan
516b1(myang 'das): rked pa la phyag 'tshal//de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lam//'on te bcom ldan lte ba la phyag 'tshal//kyi hud bcom ldan mya ngan 'das ma mthong //bdag la phyug/
516b2(myang 'das): 'tshal gnas ni bstan du gsol//bcom ldan bzhugs ni 'khor rnams kun la bde//mya ngan 'das na thams cad sdug bsngal non//kyi hud kyi hud sdug bsngal shin tu gdung ste//
516b3(myang 'das): thugs rje chen po phyag gnas bstan du gsol//de'i tshe 'od srung ngus nas tshigs su btsod pa de skad ces smras ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos zhi bas gnyis
516b4(myang 'das): 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mchen sgrom gyi phyi rol tu mngon par bstan te/'khor lo rtsibs skyong dang ldan pa las 'od zer stong snyed bkye nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
516b5(myang 'das): khams kun snang bar byas so//de'i tshe 'od srung 'khor rnams dang bcas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mthong nas thams cad kyis phyag btsal te ngus nas brgyal lo//
516b6(myang 'das): de nas ring mo zhig lon nas phyir sangs te 'khor dang bcas pas shin tu ngus te g.yas nas len bdun bskor nas sangs rgyas la phyag btsal te/dra ba'i sgras 'jig rten gyi
516b7(myang 'das): khams kyang g.yos nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces smras so//bder gshegs mthor phyin thugs rje chen po ni//snyoms
517a1(myang 'das): par byams pa'i 'od ni gnyis su med//sems can rnam par sman na gar yang skyon//zhabs gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs stong ldan pa mthong //bdag gis dang nga'i
517a2(myang 'das): sems kyis gus phyag 'tshal//'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i zhabs gnyis la'o//'khor lo'i mtshan las 'od stong rab bkye nas//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun snang
517a3(myang 'das): bar mdzad//bdag gi spyi bos gus par phyag kyang 'tshal//'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'od zer la'o//skye bo 'od kyis phog nas rnam par grol//ngan song gsum dang
517a4(myang 'das): bgegs brgyad sdug bsngal spangs//bdag gi spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal ba//'khor lo'i 'od kyis ngan song sgrol ba la'o//bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa grangs med par
517a5(myang 'das): bdag cag slad du shin tu dka' ba mdzad//de dbang rdo rje lta bu'i sku rnyed nas//zhabs kyi 'og nas 'od zer stong yar bkye//skyabs gsol spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal ba//
517a6(myang 'das): sems can bde bar mdzad pa'i 'khor lo la'o//thams cad phyir du bsod nams kun bsags nas//byang chub shing drung rnam bzhi bdud kyang btul//bdud bzhi btul nas
517a7(myang 'das): mu stegs can yang bab//de bas sems can yang dag lta bar gyur//bdag gi spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal ba//sems can yang dag lta ba'i 'od zer zhabs//sangs rgyas
517b1(myang 'das): kun gyi byams pa'i pha dang mtshungs//zhabs kyi 'od kyang mnyam par sems can sgrol//bdag gis skyangs gsol gus par phyag 'tshal ba//sdug bsngal spong ba'i zhabs kyi
517b2(myang 'das): 'khor lo la'o//bdag gis zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od mthong nas//dga' dang mo dga' sems kyang shin tu gdungs//bdag gis smre sngags 'don cing phyag 'tshal ba//rtsibs
517b3(myang 'das): stong ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i mtshan la'o//skyabs gsol phyag 'tshal zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od//mthar phyin theg pas 'jig rten gsum las 'da'//gus par phyag 'tshal
517b4(myang 'das): lha mi skyabs mchi zhabs//'khor lo'i 'od kyis srid gsum sdug bsngal snang //skye bo sdug bsngal sgo los ma grol rnams//zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od la skyabs kyang gsol//
517b5(myang 'das): bdag cig 'khor ba las ni yongs su ma grol ba//zhabs kyi 'khor los yongs su grol bar mjed//kyi hud re sdug so so'i skye ba rnams//yun rings zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i
517b6(myang 'das): 'od mi mthong //'khor lo bcom ldan thugs rje chen po yis//rtsibs stong ldan pa'i 'khor lo zhabs kyi 'od//kyi hud dang 'dir 'khor lo'i mtshan mthong ba//de ni slan chad
517b7(myang 'das): mthong ba'i dus ma mchis//de'i tshe 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te tshigs su bcas pa de skad ces smras nas yang brgyal te sa la 'gyel to//de nas ring zhig lon nas phyir sangs te/
518a1(myang 'das): mya ngan bsangs so//bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsibs stong ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i mtshan gyi zhabs gnyis kyang phyir sgom gyi nang du nub nas mi snang bar gyur to//
518a2(myang 'das): de'i tshe na grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /bud med dang /lha dang mi mang po thams cad kyis 'od srung chen po de ltar gyur pa mthong nas//yang brang brdungs te du de mo chen po de skad
518a3(myang 'das): phyung ste ngus nas dud mo'i sgras stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par grags te/so so nas mchod pa'i yo byad kyis yang mchod ngo //de'i tshe na rtswa mchog gi grong
518a4(myang 'das): khyer ni gnas pa'i gyang stobs po che bzhi zhig lus yongs su brgyan te//rin po che sna bdun gyi me shing rtswa'i 'khor lo tsam thogs nas/spos kyi shing btsar ba bsregs na
518a5(myang 'das): mo rangat+na shi'o//de la 'od srung gis 'di skad ces smras so//'phags pa chen po'i rin po che'i pur sgom mi khams gsum gyi mes 'tshig par mi nus na gyang khyed kyi mes 'tshig
518a6(myang 'das): pa lta ci smos/grong khyer dra na gzhan yang byang stobs po che brgyad kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi me chen po thog su te/pur sbram gyi drung du bzhag na me de'ang rang shi'o//gzhan yang
518a7(myang 'das): gyad stobs po che bcu drug gis rin po che sna bdun gyi me chen po thogs te/spos kyi shing bsregs na me do'ang rang shi'o//gzhan yang gyad sum cu rtsa drug snyed kyis rin po che
518b1(myang 'das): sna bdun gyi mchen po thogs te bskyegs na me de'ang rang shi'o//de'i tshe 'od srung chen pos gyad rnams dang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//khyed 'di ltar rig par gyis
518b2(myang 'das): shig/gral te lha dang mi lnga sogs pa'i me thams cad kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom 'tshig par mi 'gyur gyis/mi nus bzhin du las lto bar 'gyur ba ma byed
518b3(myang 'das): cig/de'i tshe grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /bud med dang /lha dang mi la sogs pa 'khor mang po thams cad kyis shin tu ngus nas mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis kyang
518b4(myang 'das): mchod de/dus gcig tu phyog 'tshul nas lan bdun bskor te/ngus pa'i drang mo'i sgras stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su grags par gyur to//de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs
518b5(myang 'das): pas thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis thugs ka nas me mched de/sgrom gyi phyi rol du 'bab nas bags kyis spos shing brtsigs pa la mched de/zhag bdun lon nas me shi
518b6(myang 'das): bar gyur to//de'i tshun grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /bud med dang /lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po rnams zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad par ngu zhing mchod pa'ang/
518b7(myang 'das): rgyun du byed do//de'i tshe na phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi'i yid la 'di snyam bsams so//bdag cag gis spos kyi chus me bsad de/sku gdung myur du bslangs la lha'i 'jig
519a1(myang 'das): rten du mchod pa bya'o snyam bsdams nas so so nas rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa'i gser gyi bus pa spos chus yongs su bkang ba thogs te/gzhan yang /
519a2(myang 'das): rirab lhun po'i ngos bzhi ni bdud rtsi'i 'o ma theg pa'i shing sbom khyad 'drim stong gis 'khor ba/mtho khyad dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa'ang dus gcig tu mgon po bzhi dang bcas te
519a3(myang 'das): zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas su phyin nas shing gi 'o ma dang spos chu cig tsar du me'i steng du blugs na mau sbar bas cher mchod de ma shi'o//de'i tshe na rgya mtsho'i lha klu'i rgyal po
519a4(myang 'das): rgya mtsho mching rnams dang /gtsang po'i lha dang /chu klung gi lha rnams kyis de ltar me ma shi ba mthong nas/de dag kyang so so nas 'di snyam du bsams so//bdag cag
519a5(myang 'das): gis spos chu thogs la me bsad te/sku gdung myur du bsdus te bdag cag gi gnas su mchod pa bya'o snyam bsams nas so so nas rin po che'i bum pa spos chu tshad med pas
519a6(myang 'das): bgrang ba thogs nas dus gcig tu zhugs la bzhin po'i gnas su lhags te chus drugs kyang mai shrI bar ma gyur gyi phyir mched do//de'i tshe ma 'gags pas rgyal po chen po
519a7(myang 'das): bzhi dang rgya mtsho'i lha la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so//khyod spos chu thogs te me gsod pa'i'adi sku gdung 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin nam/de dag gi sad de bzhin no
519b1(myang 'das): zhes smras so//ma 'gags pas rgyal po chen po bzhi lnga smras pa/khyed ni shin tu'ang 'dod pa che'o//khyad gnam gyi steng lha'i khams su gnas te/sku gdung kun khyod 'dod pa
519b2(myang 'das): ltar lha'i khams su bskur nas lnga gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis der mchod pa byung du 'gror rung ngam/rgya mtsho'i lha rnams la'ang 'di skad ces smras so//khyed ni rgya mtsho'o nang dang
519b3(myang 'das): gtsang po'i nang na gnas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ril bgyis khyed la bskur na sa la gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis ji ltar de dag tu mchod pa bya bar 'gyur zhes smras so//
519b4(myang 'das): de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi nyes pa bshags nas phyir lha'i gnas su dong ngo //de'i tshe rgya mtsho'i lha dang /gtsang po'i lha rnams kyang nyes pa bshags nas 'phags pa khyod
519b5(myang 'das): gsung ba bzhin no zhes smras nas phyir gnas su dong ngo //de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa dang /mchod pa'i yo byad thogs te/zhugs la bzhin pa'i
519b6(myang 'das): gnas su lhags ma thag tu me 'dra rang shi bar gyur to//de nas brgya byon gyis rin po che'i pur sgrom dbye zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba bslang bar rtsal ba las ma
519b7(myang 'das): 'gags pas brgya byin la khyod ci byed ces smras so//brgya byin gyis smras pa/bdag de bzhin gshogs pa'i tshems mche ba lha'i 'jig rten du mchod pa bya'o zhes smras so//
520a1(myang 'das): ma 'gags pas smras pa/de ltar khyod gcig pus slar bslang du mi rung gis 'khor rnams tshogs te gdod bgo bar bya'o zhes smras so//brgya byin gyis smras pa/
520a2(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar ring bsrel tshoms mche ba gcig gnang bas na bdag mchis ma thag tu me'ang rang shi bar gyur to zhes smras nas/rin po che'i pur sgrom phye ste/sangs
520a3(myang 'das): rgyas kyi 'gram pa g.yas pa'i tshems mche ba gong ma gcig lha'i 'jig rten du spyan drangs nas mchod rten byas te mchod do//de'i tshe na srin po shin tu myur ba dang ldan pa gnyis shig/
520a4(myang 'das): lus mi snang bar sbas nas brgya byin gyi phyi bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi tshems mche ba gnyis brkus na/'khor mang po kun gyis mu tshor ro//de'i tshe na grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /bud
520a5(myang 'das): med dang 'khor mang po thams cad kyis ring bsrel rtod du che ba las ma 'gags pas 'di skad ces smras so//khyed rnams re zhig sdod cig/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
520a6(myang 'das): pa'i lung bzhin du legs par bgos te mchod pa bya'o//de'i tshe na grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /bud med dang /'khor mang pos ma 'gags pas smras pa ma thos pa rnams /
520a7(myang 'das): so so nas mtshon shag ti dang mda' gzhu dang /ral gri dang /zhags po la sogs te mtshon mang po thogs nas ring bsrel rtod du chas so//de nas grong khyer de'i mi rnams
520b1(myang 'das): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bur sgom phyed shing bal dang /rus dkar po'ang cang ma 'tshig par 'khor rnams kyis mthong nas lhag par mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te mchi ma blags nas dus
520b2(myang 'das): so//de nas dus bzhin du mchod de phyag btsal nas/pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang sgyur chen po'i shugs///
520b3(myang 'das): 'jig rten thams cad kun la dbang sbyor mdzad//thugs rje chen po sngon gyi smon lam gyis//srid pa'i rgya mtshor sems can yongs su sgrol//tshad med ye shes mngon par shes pa'i
520b4(myang 'das): mthu//thogs pa med pa sred pa'i 'khor bar 'jug/sku gcig las ni sku ming rnam par ston//sku mang sku gcig de bzhin tshad kyang med//'dul bar 'gyur ba byin gyi rlabs kyis
520b5(myang 'das): mthong //rgyu med pa la mya ngan 'da' ba ston//bdag cag bsod nams zad de rgyu med pas//de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su btang bar gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin chen
520b6(myang 'das): pubur sgrom ni//gyad kun bzlog ste bteg kyang bskyod ma nus//thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis 'phags pa ni//steng gi nam mkha' ta la gcig gi srid//mkha' las rtswa mchog
520b7(myang 'das): grong khyer bskor cing gshegs//zhag bdun gyis ni grong khyer lan bdun bskor//de ltar bskor nas zhugs bzhin gnas su gshegs//ma 'dres pa yi rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa ni//
521a1(myang 'das): lha mir bcas pa thams cad dpog mi nus//bcom ldan yongs su mya ngan 'das pa ni//rdo rje lta bur mi 'jig dbang sgyur mthu//thams cad mos ni
521a2(myang 'das): bzhin par ma gyur to//thugs ka nas ni byams pa'i me phyung nas//zhag bdun bar du bzhin par gyur pa bstun//lha mir bcas pas sod par ma gyur gyi//bcom ldan thugs rje chen po'i
521a3(myang 'das): shugs bstan pas//brgya byin lhags ma thag tu me yang shi/shing bal bzang pos sangs rgyas sku dkris pa//me chen mang bsregs 'tshig par ma gyur to//ras dkar rin
521a4(myang 'das): chen pur sgom bcug pa yang //me yi nang na 'tshig par ma gyur pas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang skyar mthus rtogs so//chos kyi dbang sgyur chos kyi rgyal po las//phyag/
521a5(myang 'das): 'tshal thugs rje 'jig rten mgon po la'o//'phags pa'i nang na bsnyengs med phyag kyang 'tshal//phyag 'tshal kun tu thugs rje chen po'i stobs//phyag 'tshal byin gyis brlabs pa
521a6(myang 'das): dbang sgyur ba//bdag cag slan chud bcom ldan 'das dang bral//sdug bsngal nang du nub kyang mgon+do skyabs med//kyi hud kyi hud 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das//yun du bral nus
521a7(myang 'das): mthong ba'i dus ma mchis//de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/shin tu ngus te so so nas mchod pa'i yo byad thogs te mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe
521b1(myang 'das): nam 'gags pas 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang /mi dang /'khor mang po dang /grong khyer de'i mi thams cad kyi phyir pur sgrom gyi drung du bsnyen te/ras drang shing bal gyis
521b2(myang 'das): dkris pa la bltas na/'od srung gis dkris pa'i ras dkar po yug stong dang /grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis phul pa'i rwas dkar po yug stong la tha ma gnyis dang shing bal ni
521b3(myang 'das): ma 'tshig gi/gzhan thams cad ni mes 'tshig go/de nas ma 'gags pas ras dkar po rnams dang /shing bal gyi rnams dum bur gshegs te/'khor mang po rnams
521b4(myang 'das): la bkos nas rin po che'i mchod rten byas te mchod do//ma 'gags pas ras 'tshig pa'i gzhob kyang so sor bgos nas rin po che'i mchod rten byas te mchod do//thal ba
521b5(myang 'das): gzhan ni bgor yang mi khom par so sor bslangs nas mchod rten byas te mchod do//grong khyer de'i mi rnams kyis snga nas mgar ba la gser gyi sgrom seng ge'i khris bteg pa
521b6(myang 'das): rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su brgyad pa brgyad byas so//rin po che'i sgrom brgyad po de dag re re'ang khal phyed phyed shong ba ste/rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri'i steng du bzhag
521b7(myang 'das): go/rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po do ra re zhing yang gyad sum cu rtsa gnyis snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su brgyan pa/lus la dar sna tshogs kyis dkris pa dag
522a1(myang 'das): gis rin po che sna bdun gyis seng ge'i khri bteg go//seng ge'i khri de re re'i steng yang rin po che'i rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan pa'i bu mo brgyad brgyad kyis rin po che sna
522a2(myang 'das): bdun gyi sgrom 'dzin to//khri de re ro'i steng yang rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su brgyan pa'i bu mo brgyad brgyad kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thogs te/gser sgom yongs
522a3(myang 'das): su bkab bo//khri de re re'i steng na gzhan yang lus yongs su brgyan pa'i bu mo brgyad brgyad kyis so so nas rin po che sna bdun gyi ral gre thogs te/rin po che sna bdun gyi sgom
522a4(myang 'das): bsrung ngo //khri de re re'i steng na gzhan yang lus yongs su brgyan pa'i bu mo brgyad brgyad kyis so so nas/bya bum thogs te sgrom gyi ngos bzhin bgreng ngo //khri de re re la'ang
522a5(myang 'das): mi tshad med pa snyed kyis so so nas lha'i rol mo dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /rin po che'i gdugs dang /spos dang /me tog dang /do shal thogs te 'khor bar bskor nas
522a6(myang 'das): mchod pa byed do//khri dwe re re la gzhan yang mi tshad med pa snyed so so nas mda' gzhu dang /mtshon shag ti dang /zhugs pa dang /lcags kyu dang /dgra cha'ang tshang bar thogs te yongs su
522a7(myang 'das): bskor naso rje mchog gi grong khyer nas byung ste/zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas gang na bar dong ngo //rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po song ba'i rjes bzhin du grong
522b1(myang 'das): khye de'i mi dag gis so so nas grangs med pa'i spos kyi 'ad 'gu dang /spos chu thogs te gyang rnams song ba'i rjes bzhin du smos kyi 'da' gus byugs te/grong khyer nas zhugs la bzhin
522b2(myang 'das): de'i bar du spos lamra yongs su dag cing shin tu yangs pa byas so//lam de'i g.yas g.yon na grangs med pa'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /gdugs dang /spos dang /
522b3(myang 'das): me tog dang /mu tig dang /do shal dang /dar gyi lda lnga dang /rol mo dang /glu gar la sogs pa thams cad kyis la mo g.yas g.yon brgyan te/bcom ldan 'das kyi ring
522b4(myang 'das): bsrel slar gshegs pa sdod do//de nas byung rnams kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po bteg ste zhugs la bzhin pa'i gnas su phyin nas thams cad kyis skad kyis
522b5(myang 'das): brnangs pa tsam du shin tu dus nas dud mo'i sgra stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grags par gyur te/s+ya s+ya nas dud pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe bcom
522b6(myang 'das): ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis rdo rje lta bu'i sku ring bsrel phra mor gsil te/tshems mche ba bzhi ni so bzhin du bzhag go/de nas 'khor mong po rnams kyis de ltar sku
522b7(myang 'das): gdung phra mor gyur pa mthong nas/lhag par mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te ngus nas mchod par byas so//de nas ma 'gags pa dang grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis mig mchi mas gang
523a1(myang 'das): bzhin du rang bsrol rnams bsdus nas seng go'i khri'i steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi sgrom du thugs te/sgrom brgyad po gang nas sku gdung yang zad par gyur to//
523a2(myang 'das): de'i tshe 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi thams cad kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gser gyi sgrom gyi nang du gshegs pa mthong nas/lhag par mya ngan gyis yid gdungs//
523a3(myang 'das): teta ngus nas mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe grong khyer de na gnas pa'i stobs po che rnams dang /skyes pa dang /bud med rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel gyi sgro ma rtswa mchog gi/
523a4(myang 'das): grong khyer du gshegs pa na/'khor mang po rnams lhag par shin tu ngus nas mchi ma blags te mchod pa byas so//de nas stongs po che rnams 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu ngus
523a5(myang 'das): nas rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po bteg ste spros kyi 'di' gus bskus pa'i lam thog thug tu rno mchog gi grong khyer du gshegs so//de nas lha dang mi dang 'khor
523a6(myang 'das): mang po rnams shin tu ngus te/dud mo'i sgra 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu grags par gyur te/so so nas ci thogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
523a7(myang 'das): gdung mchod nas grong khyer gyi nang du lam gyi gzhi mdor bzhag go/de'i tshe grong khyer rtswa mchog na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis dmag grangs med pa rnam bzhi bshams nas/
523b1(myang 'das): go cha dang mtshon cha sna tshong bar thogs te/grong khyer rtswa mchog gi ngos bzhi 'khor bar rim pa grangs med par bskor nas sdod pa'ang ring bsrel gzhan gyis blogs kyis dogs nas bsrung
523b2(myang 'das): btsam gyis phyir dmig ba shams kyi/'thab pa'i sems ni med do//gzhan yang sngags mkhan chen po lnga brgya snyed kyis bgegs mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi sgo bani
523b3(myang 'das): bsrungs so//gzhan yang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /ba den dang /gdugs dang /rgyun rnam pa sna tshogs dang /bya bum la sogs pa grong khyer gyi grwa bzhir mchod pa'i rgyal mtshan
523b4(myang 'das): du btsugs so//de nas grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /bud med dang /lha dang /mi la sogs pa 'khor mang po thams cad skod chen por rgyun mo chad par ngus te/mchod pa'i yo byad ci
523b5(myang 'das): 'byor pas dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas so//rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po de re re la'ang sngags mkhan lnga brgyas lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /ye
523b6(myang 'das): dragos dang /srin po la stsogs pas phrogs kyis dogs nas bsrungs so//de ltar zhag gcig len nas de bzhin gshegs pa sngon be ltams pa'i yul sor skya'i rgyal po 'khor shAka gi
523b7(myang 'das): rigs la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mtshor te/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon
524a1(myang 'das): pa dang /gdod tshor nas/yul ser skya'i rgyal po shAg gi rigs dang bcas te rab tu ngus nas myur bar grong khyer rtswa mchog gang na bar lhags te/dmag
524a2(myang 'das): grangs med pa rnams kyis bskor ba dang /grong khyer gyi glu bzhir rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan btsugs pa'ang mthong /grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir sngags mkhan mang po 'du
524a3(myang 'das): ba'ang mthong nas/rgyal po dang shAkya'i rigs rnams kyis sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam zhes smras so//sngags mkhan gyis smos pa/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas
524a4(myang 'das): zhag bdun bzhi lon to/zhugs lu bzhin nas da ltar ring bsrel bgod do//rgyalnga pos smras pa/bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gnyen lags te/bcom ldan 'das kyi
524a5(myang 'das): byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa ni mtshor na/da bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ba ltar 'gro nA/khyed kyis
524a6(myang 'das): mo 'gegs par lam dang sgo phye zhig/sngags mkhan dang dmago rnams kyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas/rgyal po dang shAg gi rigs rnams rlung du btang ngo //de dag gis bcom
524a7(myang 'das): ldan 'das kyi sku gdung mthong nas skad brnangs pa tsam du ngud mas btang ste/g.yas phyogs nas lan bdun bskor nas/mchi ma phyis te 'di skad ces smras so//de bzhin gshegs
524b1(myang 'das): ba'i ring bsrel cha gcig tsam bdag cag gi mchod pa'i gnas su phyin cig ces smras so//'khor mang po rnams kyis smras pa/khyed shAka gI rigs kyang yin la gnyen du'ang ba shes
524b2(myang 'das): na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni khyad la ma byin te/ring bsrol 'di dag kyang so so nas bdag po yod pas khyed kyis mi thob kyis phyir deng zhig ces smras so//de'i tshe na rgyal po dang shAg
524b3(myang 'das): gi rigs rnams kyis ring bsrel gyi skal ba ma thob pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ngus nas sa la brgyal lo//de nas ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sangs nas mi dga' blo zhin 'khor med
524b4(myang 'das): po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bdag cag gi shAg gi rigs yin te/khyed la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'dir mya ngan las 'das na/ci'i phyir bdag cag
524b5(myang 'das): la ring bsrel gyi shas tsam yang mi sbyin zhes smras nas/ring bsrel la phyag btsa l-i tAM lan bdun bskor nos dus bzhin du khros te phyir dong ngo //de'i tshe yul dbus 'gyur 'chang gi
524b6(myang 'das): rgyal po ma skyes dgra pha bsad pas shin tu 'gyod te/lus la 'brum bu ma rungs pa byung ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer zla ba zhes bya ba lus la reg nas 'phrum bu'ang brags kyis sos
524b7(myang 'das): to/bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags te 'thol tshangs byas so//bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sman gyis lus bkrus te/kha na ma tho ba'i sdig byang nas
525a1(myang 'das): phyir pho brang du dong nas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma tshor ro//bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i nub mo rmi lam 'di dag rmis so//
525a2(myang 'das): zla ba sa la ltung nas sa la nyi ma shar te skar ma sbyin la char bzhin du 'bab pa dang /dud pa sa las byung nas skar ma'i gza' bdun po gnam la mngon du snang ba dang gnam la me'i phung po chen
525a3(myang 'das): bo 'bar te mkha' la mngon du 'bar nas dus gcig tu sa la lhung snyam rmis nas/de ma thag tu sad de shin tu dngangs nas blon po rnams bsdus te/'di lta bu zhig rmis na ci la lta zhes
525a4(myang 'das): bka' stsal to//blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/'di ni sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i lhas lags te/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas khams gsum na lam
525a5(myang 'das): rgyud drug gi sems can la nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang bas me chen po gnam las ltung ba lags so//sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/zla ba lta bu'i thugs rje'i
525a6(myang 'das): 'di dang kun la snyoms par khyab pa'i shes rab nub par 'gyur bas zla ba sa la lhung ba lags so//skar ma sA la ltung ba ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas/spyod lam brgyad khri
525a7(myang 'das): dang /tshul khrims thams cad las skye bo thams cad 'gal bar byed do//sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du mi byed kyi/log pa'i chos spyod pas sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //
525b1(myang 'das): nyims la ltung ba ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas/ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po nyi ma lta bur 'jig rten du shar bas rmi lam 'di dag dris pa lags so//rgyal pos de skad ces
525b2(myang 'das): zos nas nam dpung tshigs na blon po'i 'khor dang bcas te/grong khyer rna mtshig dang nye ba zhig tu lhags nas/dmag gi tshegs grangs med pa rnam bzhis rtswa mchog gi grong khyer rim pa
525b3(myang 'das): grangs med par bskor ba dang /sgo bzhin bgegs bsrung ba'i sngags mkhan la sogs pa'ang mthong nas sngags mkhan la 'di skad ces smras so//ci sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das
525b4(myang 'das): snum/sngags mkhan gyis smras pa/sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas deng du zhag bdun bzhi lon te/'khor mang po rnams de ltar sku gdung bgod do//rgyal pos smras pa/bdag
525b5(myang 'das): gis sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa ma rtogs te/rmi lam du lngas ngan pa mthong nas blon po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i ltas yin no zhes smras nas bdag cag
525b6(myang 'das): 'dir lhags na/bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i sku gdung la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba'i lam phye zhig ces smras so//sngags mkhan rnams kyis rgyal po grong khyer gyi nang du
525b7(myang 'das): btang ngo //lam gyi bzhi mdor seng ge'i khri'i steng na gser gyi sgrom du rang bsrel ba zhag nas/'khor mang po thams cad kyis ngu bzhin du mchod pa byed pa mthong nas/rgyal po 'khor dang bcas
526a1(myang 'das): te phyag byas nas ngus te/g.yas phyogs nas lan bdun bskor nas mchod pa byas so//de nas 'khor mang po la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel shas
526a2(myang 'das): kyis ci gnang zhes gsol nas/'khor rnams kyis spros pa/rgyal po chen po 'phyas so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung bgo ba'ang su la gnang ba sngar bka' stsal pas/rgyal
526a3(myang 'das): po'i skal ba med kyis slar dngas shing //rgyal po ma skyes dgras de skad ces smras pa thos nas gsol ba bzhin du ma gyur pas mi dga' bzhin du ring bsrel la phyag btsal te phyir dong
526a4(myang 'das): ngo //de'i tshe yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'ang sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon nas gdod rtogs te/'khor dang bcas su rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi drung
526a5(myang 'das): du lhags so//rtsa mchog gi grong khyer la dmag tshogs grangs med pas rim pa grangs med par bskor ba mthong ngo //de'i tshe yul a kA leg gi rgyal po sangs rgyas mya ngan las
526a6(myang 'das): 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon nas gdong tshur te/myur bar rtswa mchog gi grong khyer du lhags nas grong khyer rtswa mchog na dmag gi tshogs grangs med pas rim pa grangs med
526a7(myang 'das): par bskor ba mthong ngo //de'i tshe yul byi nu ti'i rgyal po mi 'jig pa zhes bya ba'ang sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon nas gdod tshor ro//
526b1(myang 'das): de'i tshe yul tsa la ka'i rgyal po'ang sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon nas gdod tshor ro//de'i tshe rgyal po shi ka zhes bya ba'ang sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas
526b2(myang 'das): zhag bdun gsum lon nas gdod tshor ro//de'i tshe ba sha la mu stegs can gyi rgyal po'ang sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon nas gdod tshor te/blon po'i
526b3(myang 'das): 'khor dang bcas nas grong khyer rtswa mchog tu lhags te/grong khyer rtswa mchog la dmag gi tshogs grangs med pas bskor te bsrung ba dang /sgo bzhir yang sngags mkhan gyis sgo
526b4(myang 'das): srung ba mthong nas sngags mkhan la 'di skad ces smras so//ci sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam/sngags mkhan gyis smras pa/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag
526b5(myang 'das): bdun bzhi lon te/de ltar 'khor mang po sku gdung bgo ba'i las byed do//bdag cag gis sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'aja ma tshor te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring
526b6(myang 'das): bsro la phyag 'tshal du 'gro na/khyed lam phyi zhig ces smras so//sngags mkhan gyis rgyal po grong khyer gyi nang du btang nas/lam gyi bzhi mdor seng ge'i khri'i steng na rin po che sna
526b7(myang 'das): bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gser gyi sgrom du ring bsrel bzhugs pa mthong nas thams cad kyis dus gcig tu phyag btsal te/ngus nas g.yas phyogs su lan bdun bskor te/mchod pa
527a1(myang 'das): ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas so//rgyal pos smras pa/bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa sngar ma tshor na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
527a2(myang 'das): shas kyis mchod pa'i rten du ci gnang zhes gsol to//'khor rnams kyis smras pa/sku gdung bgo ba'i cho ga sngar bka' stsal te/rgyal po skal ba med kyis slar dengs shig/
527a3(myang 'das): rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te sku gdung ma thob pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/sku gdung la phyag btsal nas dus bzhin du phyir dong ngo //'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las
527a4(myang 'das): 'das pa chen de'i mdo//rdzogs so////mdo mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya nag nas bsgyur ba 'di/rgya nag gi mkhan po wang phab zhun dang /d+harma'i
527a5(myang 'das): gzhi 'dzin dge ba'i blo gros dang /lo tsA ba rgya mtsho'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o///ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA/he tun+teShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba
527a6(myang 'das): data/te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha/e bam+b+ha dI ma hA shra ma NaH/
